loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua sells charcoal in Abuenu. She is married to a farmer. Ekua has been selling charcoal for six years. She helps her husband to feed their children. Her loan will be used to purchase more bags of charcoal to sell. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Sin Limite Group

texts.es: La Sra. María Ocampo de 70 años de edad. Lleva 10 años siendo cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de bebidas como gaseosa, cerveza y agua mineral. Tiene 36 años dedicándose a este negocio con el cual inició cuando trabajaba en una tienda donde aprendió y decidió abrir un negocio propio con la idea de obtener ingresos para sus gastos de consumo y ahorro para después poder ampliar su local de ventas. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo ha logrado construir su casa y aumentar su mercadería. Actualmente su ingreso lo destina a cubrir los gastos de alimentación, agua y luz. Su plan para el futuro es seguir comprando mercadería para su negocio y remodelar su hogar. Ella pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Mujeres sin Límite”, con el cual lleva 1 año siendo socia y 6 meses como presidenta del grupo, el cual esta conformado por 6 personas y que se formo por la visita del analista a cada una de las socias. María piensa usar el reciente préstamo en la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en: María Ocampo is 70 years old. For 10 years, she has been a client of Edaprospo and sells drinks like soda, beer and mineral water. She has been in this business for 36 years. She started this business when working in a store where she learned, and decided to open her own business with the idea of obtaining income for her consumption costs and savings to be able to later expand her store. With her effort and work, she has constructed her home and increased her merchandise. Currently, she is using the income to cover food, water and electricity expenses. Her plan for the future is to continue buying merchandise for her business and to remodel her home. She belong to the communal bank “Mujeres sin Límite” (Women without Limits), which she has been a member of for 1 year and president of for 6 months. The group is made up of 6 people and was formed by the advisor visiting each one of the members. María plans to use this most-recent loan to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is married and has 5 children. Ama cooks banku (cooked fermented corn dough) to sell in Abuenu, and has done so for one year. Her husband is a farmer. Ama uses her income to help her husband to feed their children. Ama will use the loan to purchase bags of maize for preparing the banku she sells. With the new profits, Ama plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize for the preparation of the banku she sells.

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es:
Rebeca de 53 años convive con Luis, su incondicional pareja con quien tiene 5 hijos, pero solo vive con 3 de ellos, los menores. Ellos viven en una casa propia en la comunidad nativa Villa María, provincia de Chanchamayo. Rebeca es una mujer de campo. Se dedica a la agricultura, en sus 2 parcelas de terrenos siembra de café y plátanos. “Es muy cansado este trabajo por eso me ayudan mi esposo y mis hijos”, comenta.
De esa manera sus 2 hijos que ya son independientes, pudieron salir de la familia con una base educativa y de emprendimiento para formar sus nuevos hogares. 
Lleva más de 30 años en esta actividad y ha tenido que afrontar problemas como la falta de personal, el clima, y las enfermedades de sus plantaciones. A sus 53 años cree que puede solucionar con facilidad e inteligencia esos inconvenientes. Sus fuerzas no serán las mismas unos años más adelante, así que piensa adquirir un pequeño automóvil para movilizar sus productos hacia la ciudad de Pichanaki y para uso personal.
Así ahorrará en el gasto de traslados o fletes. Éste sería su primer préstamo que obtendría gracias a su ayuda de MFP, por eso se responsabiliza de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Acaba de formar parte del banco comunal “Los Productores Yaneshas”, del que se siente contenta y emocionada por el trabajo en grupos.
Invertirá el dinero en la compra de 10 bolsas de abonos orgánicos, los que esparcirá en sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
53-year-old Rebeca lives with Luis, her unconditional partner, with whom she has 5 children. Only 3 of the children live with her, the youngest ones. They live in their own home in the indigenous community of Villa María, in the province of Chanchamayo. Rebeca is a rural woman. She works in agriculture, and on her two parcels of land, cultivates coffee and bananas. “This work is very tiring, so my husband and children help me,” she comments.
In this way, her two children that are already independent were able to leave the family with a base of education and entrepreneurship to form their own homes.
She has been working in this activity for over 30 years and has had to face problems like the lack of workers, climate and sicknesses on her plantations. At 53 years old, she believes she can easily and intelligently solve these inconveniences. Her strength will not be the same a few years in the future, so she is thinking of acquiring a small automobile to transport her products to the city of Pichanaki and for personal use. 
In this way she will save on relocation and transport expenses. This would be her first loan that she would obtain thank to the help of MFP, so she takes the responsibility to be punctual in her monthly payments. She just became a member of the communal bank “Los Productores Yaneshas” with which she is happy and excited for the group work.
She will invest the money in buying 10 sacks of organic fertilizer, which she will spread in her coffee cultivation.

loans.use: to buy 10 sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: La Lindera Group

texts.es:
La Lindera es una sociedad de tres mujeres que quieren triunfar en la vida, en este grupo la presidenta es María ya que es una mujer sociable, tranquila, amigable, responsable. María es una mujer de 34 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos, vive con su familia en Latacunga Provincia de Cotopaxi.

María al igual que sus compañeras trabaja en la agricultura. Es la primera vez que trabajan con Fodemi, este crédito van a invertir en la compra de semillas de fréjol, papas para una vez cocechado venderlas y así obtener buenos ingresos que les ayudará a sustentar los gastos de su hogar y mejorar su calidad de vida.

El sueño de María es tener un local donde vender sus productos.
texts.en:
'La Lindera' is a group of three women who want to be successful in life.  The group's president is María because she is a sociable, calm, friendly and responsible person.  María is 34 years old, married, and has three children.  She lives with her children in Latacunga, in Cotopaxi province.

In common with her fellow group members, María is a farmer.  This is the first time that her group has worked with Fodemi.  They will invest this loan in buying bean and potato seeds.  When they harvest their crops, they will sell them and thereby make good income which will help them to cover their household expenses and improve their quality of life.

María's dream is to have sales premises from which she can sell her produce.

loans.use: to buy bean and potato seeds to sow and then later sell

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba is married and has five children. Aba is a petty trader. Some of the items she sells in Abuenu are cosmetics, sandals, and ladies clothing. She has been in this business for two years. Her husband is a farmer. Aba uses her income to help her husband to pay their utility bills. Aba will use the loan to purchase more cosmetics, sandals, and ladies clothing for sale. With the new profits from her business, Aba plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, sandals, and ladies clothing for sale.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: El socio es el Sr. Victor; El socio continua con su trabajo como docente en el nivel primario y alternando a esto el socio esta planeando poner una empresa propia en casa y para ello desea tener un capital que le permita montar su empresa por ahora el socio continua con el termino de arreglos de vivienda para lo cual desea el prestamo para concluir con el revestimiento y mejoramiento de sus vivienda.
texts.en: This member is Victor.  He continues working as an elementary school teacher.  He is also planning to set up his own business in his home.  In order to do this, he would like to have some capital which will allow him to set up his business.  For now, he continues repairing his home and would like this loan to finish the refurbishing and improvement of his home.

loans.use: to refurbish and improve his house

loans.name: Agripina Maritza

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania y tambien se esta dedicando al negocio de venta de juguetes,ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los jugutes y vender la artesania.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar juguetes y artesanias al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues working in her business selling handicrafts.  She is also working in the toy sales business.  She works as an itinerant vendor, from 8.00am to 5.00pm.  Through these businesses, she would like to get ahead in life.  The member's dream is to have a sales location where she can sell her toys and handicrafts.  She is requesting this loan to buy toys and handicrafts wholesale.

The member is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy toys and handicrafts wholesale

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama sells charcoal in Abuenu. She is married and has six children her husband is a farmer. Ama has been selling charcoal for ten years. She is responsible for supporting her husband in order to feed their children. Her loan will be used to buy bags of charcoal for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Originally from Venezuela, Roberto came to the United States about a year ago. He works at a company that provides heavy machinery and spare parts to Venezuela, Panama, and Paraguay. With his knowledge in commercial transport and his contacts in Venezuela, he decided to start his own logistics company in 2011. His background in the industry has helped him buy equipment such as car parts, motors, and forklifts to send to his home country for an affordable price. He hopes that his business will continue to grow so that he can provide for his family.
Roberto is happy that Kiva partner Accion USA worked with him in the beginning to help establish his credit, and now he is using this loan to build on the credit. This loan provided him with the capital to purchase more inventory, which, in turn, will help expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase inventory and build his credit.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose has been in the United States for ten years now. He decided to move from his home in Brazil to find better job opportunities. Back in Brazil, he spent most of his life doing house repairs and construction, something he does very well. Three years ago, he started his own construction company, operating the business formally for the last year. The company provides general repairs for residential and commercial buildings, painting, installation of granite countertops, and other services. Since he has two sons back in Brazil who still rely on him for financial support, it is important to Jose that his business is thriving. His vision for the future is to gain more contracts in the community and generate employment opportunities through the business.
Jose will be using this loan to purchase construction materials for future projects, while building his credit at the same time.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for future projects.

loans.name: Janet

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de camote y platano al horno,ella vende en froma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender el platano y camote al horno.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar platanos y camotes al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues selling roasted sweet potatoes and bananas.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor, from 8.00am to 4.00pm.  Through this business, she provides for her family.  The member's dream is to have a sales location from which to sell her roasted sweet potatoes and bananas.  She is requesting this loan to buy bananas and sweet potatoes wholesale.  

The member is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy bananas and sweet potatoes wholesale

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia sigue trabajando en un empresa de encomiendas de transporte,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es mejorar en su trabajo.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para su casa como arroz,azucar y leche.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues working for a transport company.  She works from 8.00am to 6.00pm and, through this work, she provides for her son.  The member's dream is to improve in her work.  She is requesting this loan to buy products for her home such as rice, sugar and milk.

The member is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy products for her home such as rice, sugar and milk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase her business, to sell more and to make good income

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his moto-taxi, and also buy furniture to set up a shop.

loans.name: María Lina

texts.es:
La señora María, tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos.

Ella se dedica desde aproximadamente un año y medio a la elaboración y venta de comida en su casa a los obreros que trabajan en la construcción de la carretera longitudinal del norte. María aprendió a elaborar los alimentos, mediante unas capacitaciones que recibió en la unidad de salud de su comunidad.

Antes de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de alimentos, ella elaboraba y vendía chocobananos, charamuscas, refrescos, entre otros. Los insumos que necesita para elaborar sus alimentos, ella los compra en un pequeño pueblo, que esta a  15 minutos caminando a pie desde su casa. 

María solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar más insumos para elaborar los alimentos y para instalar una pequeña tienda en su casa y vender azúcar, jabón, aceite, frijoles, arroz, entre otros y para comprar 2 mesas con sus sillas plásticas, para que los clientes puedan comer cómodamente, ya que actualmente lo hacen en unas pocas sillas que tiene y en el muro de su casa. Así María atenderá mejor a sus clientes y podrá recibir a más personas y con la instalación de la tienda recibirá un ingreso adicional para sostener a su familia y brindarles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is 32 years old and lives with her life partner and their two children. For about a year and a half, she has been producing and selling food in her house for the laborers who are constructing the northern highway. She learned to cook through training she received at her community health unit.

Before María started to work in food production and sales, she made and sold Chocobananas, frozen juices and soft drinks, among other items. She purchases supplies for her business from a small town, which is a 15-minute walk from her home.

Mary applied to Fundación Campo for this loan so that she can purchase more ingredients for producing food, and to establish a small shop in her home where she will sell sugar, soap, oil, beans, and rice, among other items. She will also buy two plastic tables and some chairs so that her customers can eat comfortably - she currently only has a few chairs and a wall. 

María will be able to provide better service to her customers and accomodate more people, and the establishment of the shop will generate an additional income to support her family and provide a better education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for producing food, and to establish a small shop in her home where she will sell sugar, soap, oil, beans and rice, among other items, and buy two tables and some chairs.

loans.name: Manuel Isaac

texts.es:
El señor Manuel Isaac es soltero, tiene 25 años de edad, se dedica a la artesanía a la elaboración de tejidos. de cortes típicos, inició este negocio gracias al apoyo de su señor padre y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para invertirlo, en la compra de materiales para tejido, consistente en hilos, de varios colores y clases, y mejorar su producción de cortes típicos.
texts.en:
25-year-old Manuel Isaac is single. He is a craftsman and has a weaving business, where he produces textiles in traditional styles. He started this business with the support of his father, and has four years of experience so far.

Manuel Isaac has applied for this loan to invest in the purchase of materials for textiles including yarn of various colors and types, and he aims to improve the production of his traditional items.

loans.use: to purchase yarn of various colors and types, to produce woven textiles.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia anteriormentese dedicaba al negocio de venta de yogurt pero no le fue muy bien en este negocio,ahora la socia es eta dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa y ropas interiores,ella tiene una pequeña tienda en el mercado donde atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un locla man amplio donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones,polos,blusas y casacas y ropas interiores al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member, Teresa, previously had a business selling yogurt, however the business unfortunately did not do well and she now sells clothes and undergarments. She has a small shop in the market, which is open from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. Teresa raises her family with earnings from her business, and her dream is to have a larger premises where she can sell her clothes. Teresa has sought this loan to purchase pants, polo shirts, blouses, jackets and underwear wholesale.

Teresa is happy that she can take this loan and agrees to comply with the repayments.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale pants, polo shirts, blouses, jackets and underwear for subsequent sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow that will increase production and thus enable her to increase her sales.

loans.name: San Miguel Arcangel Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son  de la cuidad de Caacupé, ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y sacrificadas. Actualmente se encuentran en el segundo ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya.
Una de las integrantes es la señora María, quien se dedica a la venta de joyas. Es un negocio muy bueno, comenta ella, pues gracias a este ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia para poder seguir creciendo. Una de sus metas es poder tener una tienda grande, donde pueda ofrecer comodidades a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de anillos, pulseras, aros y demás tipos de joyas, con las cuales podrá surtirse y ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The women who belong to this committee are from the city of Caacupé.  They are very hard-working and self-sacrificing women.  They are currently in their second loan cycle as members of Fundación Paraguaya's 'Entrepreneurial Women' program.

One of the members of this group is María, who sells jewelry.  She says that it is a very good business as it has enabled her to get ahead in life and help her family to continue growing.  One of her goals is to own a large store where she can offer her customers some comfort.

María is requesting this loan to buy rings, bracelets, earrings and other pieces of jewelry so that she can stock her business and offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy rings, bracelets, earrings and other pieces of jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
La socia sigue siendo profesora de computacion y tambien ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,aceite y leche,por medio de su trabajo y de su pequeño negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y mejorar en su trabajo como profesora.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ruth continues being a computer teacher.  She is now also devoted her business, a grocery story.  She sells basic needs products like rice, sugar, oil, and milk.  Through her work and her small business she wants to get ahead.

Her dream is to expand her grocery store business and to improve in her work as a teacher.

She is requesting the loan to buy products wholesale like rice, sugar, milk, and oil for her store.

loans.use: to buy products wholesale like rice, sugar, milk, and oil for her store.

loans.name: Agripino

texts.es: Agripino de 36 años de edad, está casado con Dida de 36 años, fruto de este gran amor tienen 3 hijos con los que viven en su casa propia ubicado en la comunidad de Tarancato del distrito de Pichari. Agripino es un reconocido y respetado agricultor, quien tiene más de 18 años cultivando café. Nos comenta que durante su trayectoria como agricultor, muchas veces fue azotado por las inclemencias del mal tiempo donde varias cosechas fueron dadas por perdidas, pero supo salir adelante y continuo sembrando café en otras parcelas, de las que ahora cosehca una buena producción. Él está feliz  por los logros que viene obteniendo hasta el momento, dice en un futuro quisiera tener una tienda de agroquímicos, ya que este negocio esta siendo rentable en esta parte del país, por el que Agripino no cesa de trabajar hasta lograr su objetivo. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Agripino agradece  a su banco comunal por haber permitido formar parte de ellos. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de abono para fertilizar su terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Agripino, age 36, is married to 36 year old Dida.  They have three children with whom they live in their own house.  The house is in the Tarancato community in the Pichari district.  Agripino is an established and respected farmer.  

He has been growing coffee for over 18 years.  During his time as a famer he has often been hit by the harshness of bad weather.  Several harvests were lost.  However, he knows how to get ahead and continue planting coffee on other fields, from which he now harvests a good production.

He is happy about what he has achieved and is getting so far.  In the future he would like to have an agrochemical store because this business is profitable in this part of the country. Agripino does not stop working until he achieves his objective.

This will be his first loan with MFP.  He pledges to make his payments on time.  Agripino is grateful to his communal bank for allowing him to be part of them.  He will use the 1,000 soles to buy manure to fertilize his farm land.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy cattle to increase her business.

loans.name: Leocadio

texts.es: Leocadio, tiene la edad  de 51 años, está soltero,  vive solo actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar alimento para mantener sus cerdos en buen estado. El cuenta con los cerdos y lo que el quiere es engordarlos rápido para la venta y así generar ganancias rápidas. Su meta es vender sus cerdos en un buen tiempo para que sea bien pagado sus animales y así con las ganancias generadas tener una estabilidad económica más estable para su futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Leocadio, 51, is single and currently lives alone.  With the loan he intends to buy feed to keep his pigs in good condition.  He depends on the pigs and what he wants is to fatten them for sale quickly and so generate quick profits.  His goal is to sell his pigs in good time so he will be well paid for his animals.  In this way, with the profits generated he will have more stable finances for his future.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  Previously, he had not had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy de 27 años convive con Obando de 27 años, fruto de esta relación tienen un hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicado en la comunidad de Tarancato del distrito de pichari. Nancy es una madre dedicada a las labores de casa y a su parcela agrícola, donde cultiva cacao en compañía de esposo. Tiene más de 7 años produciendo granos de café, del que Nancy está orgullosa ya que gracias a ellos tiene ingreso económico para su hogar. Generalmente su producto lo vende en su propia parcela, ya que anteriormente tenía que llevar hacia el distrito de pichari y eso le ocasionaba un gasto. Ahora desea abrir una tienda de abarrotes, donde pueda expender todo tipo de productos para el gsuto del cliente. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que debe comprometerse una vez más cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, desea comprar cemento para colocar el piso de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Nancy, 27, lives with Obando, 27, with whom she has one child.  Together they live in their own home located in the community of Tarancato in the district of Pichari.

Nancy is a mother who works in the home and on her parcel of land where she grows cacao with her husband.  Nancy has been producing coffee beans for more than seven years, for which she is proud, since thanks to this she has an income for her home.  Generally she sells her crop on her own land, because previously she had to take it to the district of Pichari and this created an expense.  Now she wants to open a grocery store where she can sell all types of products for the pleasure of her customers.

This will be her second loan with MFP, for which she once again is committed to making her payments punctually.  With the 2,000 PEN she wants to buy cement to put in the floor of her house.

loans.use: to buy cement.

loans.name: José Alberto

texts.es:
El señor José Alberto le a echo mantenimiento a su casa, y esta solicitando un préstamo ya que a su vivienda le esta haciendo falta los enjarres del los cuartos del interior y necesita comprar el material que es cemento, arena y pintura. Esta mejorar le servirá para tener mejor protegido su hogar y a su familia del frio 
Don José Alberto es empleado de una tienda comercial como guardia de seguridad y también los fines de semana se dedica al comercio; con estos ingresos ha logrado darles un patrimonio a sus hijos, ya que es padre soltero y tiene bajo su responsabilidad de darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
José Alberto has done maintenance on his house.  He is requesting a loan because the interior rooms are lacking plaster and he needs to buy the materials, which are cement, sand, and paint.  This improvement will serve him to better protect his home and his family from the cold.

José Alberto is employed as a security guard at a commercial store.  He also works in business on the weekend.  With this income he has managed to give his children assets, because he is a single father and is responsible for giving his family the best.

loans.use: to finish the interior of his house.

loans.name: Olga Lidia

texts.es: Olga lidia, tiene la edad  de 50 años, está casada,  vive con su esposo e hija actualmente que son su prioridad. Ella con el crédito lo que quiere comprar es los insumos como abonos y otros materiales para su siembra. Ella quiere asistir su siembra de la mejor forma para así tenerla en buenas condiciones de producción. Ella tiene como meta vender todos sus productos y a su vez generar el máximo de ganancias para su bienestar familiar y ayudarle a su esposo con las responsabilidades del hogar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Olga Lidia is 50 years old, married, and lives with her husband and daughter who are her top priority.  With this loan she wants to buy supplies like fertilizers and other materials for planting.  She wants to help her seeds in the best way possible to have better conditions for production.  Her goal is to sell all her products and in turn generate maximum profits for her family’s well being and to help her husband with household responsibilities.  This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not had any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has given her this loan conveniently and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: buy materials to plant vegetables.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Medalla Milagroda Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad de Encarnación, surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, actualmente se encuentran  en el 5º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año pasado.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Ignacia, ella se dedica a la venta de manualidades y también a la fabricación y venta de confitería. Comenta que le va muy bien, puesto que sus productos son muy vendidos por que siempre hace muy buenos. La señora Ignacia nos comenta que gracias a sus ventas ella ha podido sacar adelante a su familia y de esa forma mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de harina, coco rallado, azúcar, manteca y demás insumos que necesitará para hacer sus confites. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en: This group is from the city of Encarnación.  It came about because of one of the member’s contact with the foundation and now they are in their 5th loan cycle.  They have worked with the foundation since last year.  One of the members of the group is Ignacia, who works selling crafts, and also making and selling confectionery.  She says she is doing very well, since her products sell rapidly because they are well made.  Ignacia says that thanks to her sales, she has been able to move forward with her family and in this way improve her quality of life.  She requests the loan to buy flour, grated coconut, sugar, butter, and other ingredients necessary for her pastries.  She is grateful to the foundation and Kiva for the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: buy flour, grated coconut, sugar, butter and other ingredients.

loans.name: Pedro Faustino

texts.es:
Pedro es un joven que se gana la vida brindando el servicio de moto taxi en el cercado de la ciudad de Ica, esta actividad le demanda mucho tiempo, aproximadamente trabaja un promedio de 10 horas diarias, tiempo en el que puede obtener una ganancia entre S/.70 y S/.90 diarios,  él disfruta mucho de su trabajo, aunque nos confiesa que le hubiese gustado podido estudiar Arquitectura y convertirse en un gran diseñador de casas y otros.

Su pasatiempo favorito es poder escuchar música, es por eso que en su moto taxi ha conectado unos parlantes que le permiten escuchar todo el día la música que más le gusta mientras conduce su pequeño negocio.

Pedro sabe que su negocio tiene éxito porque actualmente la ciudad de Ica se ha convertido en una ciudad muy comercial y esto ha generado diversos puestos de trabajo, el mismo que solicita que las persones se transporten para llegar a sus trabajos, para traer mercadería u otras actividades que deseen realizar, Pedro también sabe que existe demasiada competencia y es por eso que desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarlo y así pueda hacerle una reparación y mantenimiento general a su moto taxi para que sus pasajeros se sientan más cómodos y de algún modo puedan disfrutar de su viaje, es probable que si el servicio que él les brinda a sus clientes es aprobado por ellos, entonces le solicitarán que los recojan a horas indicadas en sitios señalados.
texts.en:
Pedro is a young man who earns a living offering motorcycle taxi service in the district of the city of Ica.  This job requires a lot of time of him.  He works approximately 10 hours a day, in which time he can earn between 70 and 90 PEN a day.  He enjoys his work very much, although he confesses to us that he would have enjoyed being able to study architecture and becoming a great designer of houses and other things.

His favorite pastime is being able to listen to music.  This is why in his motorcycle taxi he has connected some speakers that allow him to listen all day long to the music he most likes while he conducts his small business.

Pedro knows that his business is successful because currently the city of Ica has become a very commercial city, which has generated various jobs, the same ones that require people to get to their jobs, to carry merchandise, or other activities they want to do.  Pedro also knows that there is a lot of competition and this is why he wants Kiva lenders to help him, so he can make a repair and give general maintenance to his motorcycle taxi.  In this way his passengers will feel more comfortable and in some way will be able to enjoy their trip.  It is likely that if his customers approve of the service he gives them, they will ask him to pick them up at certain times and places.

loans.use: to make general repairs to his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Roxana una mujer de 24 años, tiene 3 hijos los cuales aún son pequeños, el menor de ellos apenas tiene 5 meses, ella y su esposo se dedican a cuidar y velar de sus pequeños angelitos para que crezcan bien cuidados y saludables, para lograr esto Roxana y su esposo trabajan a diario, su esposo brinda el servicio de transporte en moto taxi todos los días en la ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por el incremento de inversión y la inauguración de nuevos centros comerciales, las que permiten a muchas personas obtener un empleo donde son remunerados con todos los beneficios descritos por la ley.

Actualmente Roxana se está dedicando a la venta de productos como Hamburguesas y Menús en las tardes para poder obtener el dinero que es necesario para su familia. Ella nos comenta que atiende en promedio a 50 clientes al día lo que le permite generarse un ingreso diario entre S/.30 y S/.50, dependiendo de la cantidad de comida que venda.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva ella podrá realizar algunas mejoras que necesita su pequeño negocio, como también podrá realizar la compra de mesas y sillas que son necesarias para sus clientes, ella confía que esta nueva idea de implementación le permitirá atender mejor a sus clientes porque sabe que se sentirán mucho más cómodos.

Su sueño es hacer crecer su negocio y construir una casa propia para que sus hijos, su esposo y ella puedan brindarse una mejor calidad de vida y también sientan la seguridad de tener algo propio.
texts.en:
Roxana is 24 years old. She has three children who are still small; the youngest is barely five months old. Roxana and her husband spend a lot of time looking after their little angels to make sure that they grow up well-cared-for and healthy. In order to achieve this, Roxana and her husband work every day. Her husband provides a daily moto-taxi transport service in Ica. This city has seen increased investment and the opening up of new shopping centres, which allows many people to find jobs that provide them with all of the benefits to which they are legally entitled. 

Roxana currently sells products such as hamburgers and set meals at lunchtime, in order to obtain the money that her family needs. She has told us that she serves an average of fifty customers per day, which allows her to generate a daily income of between 30 PEN and 50 PEN, depending on the amount of food she sells. 

With the help of the Kiva lenders, she will be able to make a few necessary improvements to her small business and also purchase tables and chairs for her customers to use. She is certain that this new plan will allow her to serve her customers better, since she knows it will make them feel a lot more comfortable. 

Roxana’s dream is to grow her business and build her own house so that she, her children and her husband can enjoy a better quality of life and also enjoy the security of having something of their own.

loans.use: make improvements to her business premises and purchase tables and chairs.

loans.name: Las Amigas Group

texts.es:
La formación del presente comité se inicio  con la ayuda de una de las miembros del comité Ella contacto con sus vecinas y amigas para formar su grupo, de allí surge el  comité que se Denomina “Las Amigas”  ya que todas  dependen unas de otra para que su comité salga adelante y todas las integrantes están para ayudarse y seguir progresando en sus actividades productivas.
La presidenta del comité es la Sra. Margarita; es una persona muy humilde, responsable, activa y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.    Margarita comenta que tiene una librería bien surtida, donde provee a sus vecinos con todo tipo de artículos escolares, por medio de su negocio ella puede ayudar con la economía de la casa y de esa forma mejorar el estilo de vida que llevan.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cuadernos, libros, lápices, borradores y demás artículos, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener surtido su local.
texts.en:
This communal bank was formed with the help of one of the bank members, who contacted her neighbors and friends to form her group.  From that came the bank named Las Amigas because all of them depend on each other so their bank will get ahead, and because all the members are there to help each other and continue making progress in their profitable activities.

Margarita is the president of the bank.  She is a very modest, responsible, and active person who very much wants to get ahead.  Margarita comments that she has a well-stocked bookstore where she provides her neighbors with all types of school supplies.  With this business she is able to help with the household finances and in this way improve their lifestyle.

She is requesting the loan to buy notebooks, books, pencils, erasers, and other items with which she will be able to stock her store and have a good variety.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, books, pencils, erasers, and other items.

loans.name: Julio

texts.en: Julio owns a bakery and restaurant called Rico Pan De Bono in South Florida. He has been in business for seven successful years and is slowly expanding to diversify the products the restaurant offers. Rico Pan De Bono offers Colombian baked goods and specialties. When Julio moved from Colombia to the US, he knew he wanted to bring a bit of Colombia with him while becoming an independent entrepreneur. He is proud to be his own boss and do what he loves, as he continues to provide for his family. The restaurant employs eight people, and Julio is happy that he can contribute to the economy in a positive way by offering job opportunities. The biggest challenge for Julio in his business venture has been obtaining the funding he needs to continue making improvements to the restaurant. Without credit in the United States, it has been very difficult for Julio to find a loan. This loan from Accion USA will enable Julio to purchase tables and chairs for the bakery, build a take-out window, and renovate a bathroom. The financial assistance will have a huge impact on the business, because it will allow the bakery to bring in more customers by providing additional seating. Julio is hoping that it will become a gathering place for many, so he can share his piece of Colombia with the community. “As long as my customers are happy, I am happy.”

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs for the bakery, build a take-out window and renovate a bathroom.

loans.name: Miriam Juliana

texts.es:
La señora Miriam Juliana es casada, tiene   36 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educacion primaria, tiene 5 hijos 5  de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inició este negocio con el apoyo de un familiar y hasta el momento lleva 15 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es ayudante de una camioneta.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de materia prima y mejorar su producción de cortes típicos, va ha compra hilos para tricotado y también hilos para tejido. Espera su negocio siga prosperando.
texts.en:
Miriam Juliana is 36 years old and married.  She finished the six years of elementary school.  She has five children, all of whom are studying.

She works weaving traditional clothing.  She started this business with the support of a family member, and up to now she has 15 years of experience.  She has the support of her husband, who is a truck assistant.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies and improve her production of traditional styles.  She is going to buy yarn for knitting and also thread for weaving.  She hopes her business will continue to prosper.

loans.use: to buy weaving supplies.

loans.name: Ana Rosa El Pilar

texts.es:
ciudad nombrada por la  cultura de los Chinchas, célebre por sus avanzados conocimientos de la agricultura y sus proezas marítimas. Hoy en día Chincha es una increíble mezcla de culturas, con una gran población afro-peruana, debido a los restos de un pasado indígena, y las influencias del imperio español. La ciudad, junto a otras ciudades cerca de la costa del Pacífico, fue dañada en el año 2001 y 2007, fechas en las que ocurrieron terremotos de fuerte dimensión, pero ha soportado como siempre lo ha hecho durante gran parte de su historia.

Ella es una mujer soltera que se dedica a trabajar día a día, se dedica a la venta de artesanía desde hace ya 1 año, actividad que le ha permitido solventar los gastos que ha tenido durante todo este tiempo. Son sus amigos y familiares los que constantemente compran de sus productos debido a que los consideran muy interesantes y bonitos.

Actualmente Ana desea poder comprar mucha más mercadería y así ofrecer variedad a sus clientes y continuamente se sientan motivados a comprarle, ella desea que sus ingresos mejores y convertirse en una gran microempresaria, ella tiene muchos sueños y metas, las mismas que serán logradas con el esfuerzo y dedicación que le brinde diariamente a su curioso negocio.
texts.en:
Chincha is a city named after the Chinchas, a civilisation who were famous for their advanced agricultural expertise and their maritime exploits. Nowadays Chincha is an incredible mix of cultures and has a large Afro-Peruvian population, due to the remains of its indigenous past and the influence of the Spanish empire. Together with other cities near the Pacific coast, Chincha was damaged in 2001 and 2007 by severe earthquakes, but it survived, just as it always has throughout its history. 

Ana is single and for a year she has worked every day selling craft items, an activity which has allowed her to settle her bills during this period. Her friends and family are always buying her products because they consider them interesting and very pretty.

At the moment Ana would like to be able to buy a lot more merchandise and thus offer her customers more variety so that they keep buying items from her. She would like to increase her income and become a large-scale micro-enterprise. Ana has a lot of dreams and goals, and they will be achieved thanks to the effort and dedication she brings to her remarkable business every day.

loans.use: to purchase new craft items.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
El Sr. Edilberto está casado con la Sra. Ilda  hace varios años, tienen 4 hijos menores que aun están en la escuela primaria.
Juntos montaron una despensa en su casa que está ubicada en Ciudad del Este. Se iniciaron con un pequeño capital que consiguieron con otros trabajos que han realizado anteriormente como empleados. Gracias al trabajo que están realizando  educan a sus hijos y le dan el sustento diario. El Sr. Edilberto además de la despensa trabaja como constructor de obra.
El solicita el crédito a kiva y la fundación paraguaya para la compra de arroz, fideo, azúcar y otros insumos de primera necesidad para abastecer su local. Agradece por la oportunidad que les da la fundación y kiva.
texts.en:
Edilberto has been married to Ilda for several years. They have 4 minor children who are still in primary school.

Together they opened a small store located in Ciudad del Este. They started with a little capital that they obtained from other jobs that they did before as employees. Thanks to the work they are doing, they are educating their children and supporting them. Edilberto, in addition to the store, works in construction. 

He is asking for the loan from Kiva and the Fundación Paraguaya to buy rice, pasta, sugar and more basic necessity items to stock his locale. He is grateful for the opportunity given to them by Foundation and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy rice, pasta, sugar and more.

loans.name: Xiomara Deyanira

texts.es: Xiomara Deyanira  es una  joven emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, ella  lucha por salir adelante junto con su esposo, ella emprende este negocio con el objetivo de apoyar a su esposo en los gasto del hogar, pero atreves de los años fue adquiriendo experiencia  que hoy en día aconseja a sus clientes de los productos que les ofrecer. Con el financiamiento anterior ella invirtió en mercadería y expresa que gracias al apoyo ha aumentado su inventario y sus clientes y ha salido adelante. Xiomara está solicitando nuevamente financiamiento para comprar mercadería como pantalón para dama, caballero, bolsos, calzado y perfumes entre otros productos.
texts.en: Xiomara Deyanira is a young, enterprising woman who sells general merchandise. She and her husband fight to get ahead. She started this business with the goal of helping her husband with the household expenses. Over the years she acquired experience and today she counsels her customers on the products she offers. With the previous loan, she invested in merchandise and she is thankful for the support. It increased her inventory and her customers and she has gotten ahead. Xiomara is asking for a loan again to buy merchandise such as women's and men's pants, bags, shoes, perfumes and other products.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's pasts as well as bags, shoes, perfume and other products.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
El comité se ha formado con la gestión de la señora Sofía, una mujer trabajadora y servicial, ella contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para conformar el grupo en la zona. El comité se denomina “Virgen del Carmen”, están  en el Séptimo Ciclo y está constituido por 17  integrantes; es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unido y responsable. Las integrantes poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor, de lucha y trabajo en equipo.
La señora Sofia se dedica a la venta de gallinas caseras, lo cual logró con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio. Ella gracias a su arduo trabajo le da a su familia todo lo que ellos necesitan para tener una vida cómoda, sin privaciones ni limitaciones. Su sueño es poder tener un local donde vender las gallinas que tiene.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder comprar gallinas y de esa forma aumentar su stock para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The communal bank formed with the management of Sofía, a hardworking and helpful woman.  She contacted her neighbors and friends to form the group in the area.  The bank is named Virgen del Carmen; there are 17 members and they are in their seventh cycle.  It is a group that stands out in the neighborhood for being united and responsible.  The members have a great spirit of entrepreneurship, struggle, and working together.

Sofía works selling domestic chickens, which she achieved with great effort and sacrifice.  Thanks to her hard work she gives her family everything they need to have a comfortable life, with no deprivation or restrictions.  Her dream is to be able to have a place where she can sell her chickens.

She is requesting the loan to be able to buy chickens and in this way increase the stock she offers to her customers.

loans.use: to buy chickens to sell.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en:
Ruben owns a cellular phone store in South Florida. His services include sales of mobile devices, phone plans, calling cards and accessories. 

Ruben is a hard-working young entrepreneur with many ideas for continuously improving sales. In very little time he has built a strong business and has come up with innovative ideas for business development. He and his wife both work full-time.

This loan will be used to purchase inventory; this includes accessories and cell phones. He needs an increase in inventory because promotions are increasing demand of products.

loans.use: To purchase inventory, including mobile phones and accessories.

loans.name: Alma Janett

texts.es:
La señora Alma Janett es casada, tiene 29 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educación diversificada, tiene 2 hijos los cuales aun no estudian, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de juguetes para niños, inició este negocio gracias al apoyo de su esposo, y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo negocio.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería consistente en juguetes de diferentes clases, carritos de plástico, avioncitos, juegos de cocinas en juguetes, etc. Espera que su negocio sea mas prospero.
texts.en:
Alma Janett, 29, is married and has two children who do not study yet.  She took secondary-level courses.  She works in business, selling toys for children.  She started this business thanks to the support of her husband, and up to now has five years of experience.  She counts on the help of her husband, who works in the same business.

She is requesting a loan to buy good merchandise in all kinds of toys: little plastic cars, little planes, toy kitchen sets, etc.  She hopes her business will be more prosperous.

loans.use: to buy toy merchandise.

loans.name: Torype Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
20 mujeres de ciudad del este se han unido con el propósito de trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo en conjunto poder ayudarse las unas con las otras. Ellas vieron una gran ayuda en el programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya, es por ello que decidieron unirse. Actualmente están en el décimo sexto ciclo y desean llegar al máximo nivel del programa.
Maximina nos cuenta que tiene una despensa bien surtida, con la cual puede sacar adelante a su familia. Su negocio es el único medio que la ayuda a salir adelante. Comenta que empezó con muy poco, pero que gracias a su sacrificio y esfuerzo ha podido ir creciendo de a poquito. Desea poder seguir creciendo como microempresaria y de esa forma poder ayudar más a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para surtir su local con arroz, fideo, azúcar, leche, panificados y demás artículos, los cuales tienen mucha salida y son los que más se venden.
texts.en:
Twenty women from Ciudad del Este have joined together to work as a team and through this work are able to help each other out.  They saw in Fundación Paraguaya’s enterprising women program a great help and decided to join.  They are currently in their 16th cycle and they want to reach the highest level within the program.

Maxima tells us that she has a well-stocked grocery store that she can support her family with.  Her store is the only source of help for her to get ahead.  She comments that she started out with very little but thanks to sacrifice and effort was able to gradually grow.  She wants to be able to continue growing as a micro businesswoman and thus be able to help her family even more.

She’s asking for the loan to stock her store with rice, noodles, sugar, milk, baked goods and other items which are very popular and sell the most.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Kuña Pyapy Mbarete Group

texts.es:
Kuña Pyapy Mbarete es el grupo formado en ciudad del este, por 22 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Ellas son mujeres jefas de familia, que ven el la fundación paraguaya un lugar de ayuda a ellas, ya que no cualquiera las quisieron ayudar. Actualmente se encuentran en el sexto ciclo del programa de la fundación y desean poder llegar al máximo nivel y de esa forma poder salir adelante.
Edilda es una mujer, cuyo ejemplo de trabajo motiva a las demás. Ella es una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora, y por sobre todo muy amable. Comenta que se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace ya un tiempo, y gracias a esto ha podido formarse ya una clientela bien definida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cosméticos, con lo cual podrá cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Ella al igual que sus compañeras se encuentran muy felices dentro del programa de la fundación.
texts.en:
“Kuña Pyapy Mbarete” is the group formed in Ciudad del Este by 22 women who are friends and neighbors in this city.  They are all heads of household who see Fundación Paraguaya as a help for them since no one else wanted to help them.  They are currently in the sixth cycle in the Fundación’s program and they want to reach the maximum level in order to get ahead this way.

Edilda is a woman whose work is an example for the rest of them.  She is a very responsible, hardworking woman but, above all, very nice.  She comments that she’s been selling cosmetics for quite some time now and thanks to this has been able to secure a well-defined, regular clientele.

She’s asking for the loan to buy cosmetics to fill customer orders.  She and her fellow members are very happy in the Fundación’s program.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es:
La señora Maria Josefina  ya ha tenido un crédito con KIVA el cual a pagado puntual mente; y el cual lo utilizo para comprara de mercancía. 
Solicita un préstamo para la reparación de su local, ya que tuvo que sacar parte de su mercancía que tenia es exhibición, porque con la humedad por causa de las lluvias se le estaba maltratando y desea reparar las paredes y techo del local, pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora, es por eso que esta solicitando nueva mente su cooperación en este crédito y así mejorar su negocio. 
Doña Maria Josefina es quien atiende el negocio y su esposo le ayuda con los gastos familiares con el sueldo de su trabajo, entre los dos están dándole todo lo mejor a sus dos hijos y que tengan el estudio para su futuro.
texts.en:
María Josefina has had a previous KIVA loan that she repaid punctually and that she used to buy merchandise.  She’s asking for a loan to do some repairs to her store because she had to remove some of the merchandise she had on display because the dampness caused by the rains was damaging it and she wants to repair the walls and the roof of the site but lacks the necessary money to do the repairs.  This is why she’s once again asking for cooperation for the loan to improve her business.

María Josefina tends to the store and her husband helps her cover household expenses with his salary from his job.  Between the two of them they are giving their children all the best and seeing that they have schooling for a better future.

loans.use: Mejoramientos al local del negocio

loans.name: Yahaira Concepcion

texts.es: La joven de  28 años de edad labora como docente de tiempo completo,  Solicita su crèdito para pagar una computadora que tanto ella como su hermana necesitan para hacer los trabajos de la universidad, pues ambas estan estudiando.  Yahaira  ha demostrado ser un joven con buen comportamiento, honesta y muy dedicada a su trabajo, es una joven muy amorosa con sus padres siempre esta al pendiente de ellos ya que aun no se ha casado.  Su mayor sueño en la vida construir su propia casa y formar su hogar lleno de amor y seguir profesionalizandose en sus estudios y estar bien con Dios.
texts.en: Yahira, 28, works as a full-time teacher.  She’s requesting a loan to buy a computer that both she and her sister need to do their university work since they are both taking classes.  Yahira has shown herself to be a young woman with good, honest behavior who is very dedicated to her work.  He’s a young woman who is very loving with her parents and is always attentive to them since she’s still unmarried.  Her greatest wish in life is to build her own house and form a home that’s full of love and to continue preparing herself professionally and to be in good standing with God.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Las Rosas Blancas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Soledad  es Madre solera, tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar, actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Las Rosas Blancas” grupo  conformado por 9 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Soledad  trabaja desde hace 8 años en la venta de frutas y verduras en un puesto en el mercado, este negocio surge a raíz de su divorcio, ya que  soledad tenía que mantener a sus 2 hijos , soledad nos cuenta que nada fue fácil tuvo que trabajar muy duro para sacar adelante su negocio y sacar adelante a sus hijos , gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, sus hijos van al colegio , y sobre todo su familia cuenta con una  mejor calidad de vida, con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar insumos frutas y verduras. Sabemos que Soledad  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Soledad is a single mother of two school age children.  She is currently a member of the “Las Rosas Blancas” (White Roses) communal bank that has nine members involved in various commercial activities.

Soledad has worked selling fruit and vegetables in a market stand for 8 years.  The business arose as a result of her divorce since she had to support her two children by herself.  Soledad tells us that it wasn’t at all easy and she had to work very hard to move the business forward and support her children.  Thanks to her effort and dedication she’s attained better income, her children are attending school, and above all her family has a better quality of life.

In order to continue growing, she’s asking for a new loan to buy fruit and vegetables.  We know that Soledad will reach her goals with much work and effort and that Edaprospo loans will help her.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Harlin Jose

texts.es: Harlin de 31 años de edad, tiene 6 años  de trabajar como docente para el Ministerio de Educacion,  solicita su 2do crédito para levantar dos paredes  que están en mal estado y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones en su hogar y darle mas valor a la  propiedad, segun sus compañeros de trabajo es bien responsable, honesto y muy trabajador, su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia goze de salud, amor y paz que es lo mas importante en la vida como tambien mejorar sus condiciones de vida, tener un trabajo digno bien remunerado y seguir estudiando .
texts.en: Harlin, 31, has been working for the Ministry of Education as a Teacher for six years.  He’s asking for his second loan to erect two walls that are in poor shape so that he can have better living conditions at home and increase his property’s value.  According to his coworkers, he’s quite responsible, honest and very hardworking.  His greatest dream in life is that his family enjoys good health, love and peace which are the most important things in life as well as to improve his living conditions, to have a well-paid, dignified job and to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to erect two walls.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth de 31 años de edad,  labora para el Ministerio de Educaciòn impartiendo clases de secundaria desde hace 8 años años consecutivos,  es una profesora  bien trabajadora y  muy  responsable, este crèdito lo  requiere para la instalacion de la energia electrica y la agua potable en su vivienda , y de esta manera lograr instalarse en su nueva casita segun referencias comerciales laborales y personales es bien dedicada a su trabajo y a su familia, cuenta con la ayuda del padre de sus hijos que se encuentra trabajando en Costa Rica ya que son una familia que lucha por habitar en su propio hogar, su mayor sueño en la vida es que hogar este lleno de amor y habite la presencia de Dios.
texts.en: Ruth, 31, has been working for the Ministry of Education teaching secondary school classes for 8 consecutive years.  She’s a hardworking, very responsible teacher.  She needs this loan to install electricity and potable water at home so that she can move into her new little house.  According to work, commercial and personal references, she’s quite dedicated to her work and to her family.  Her children’s father, who is working in Costa Rica, sends her support since they are a family that strives to live in a house of their own.  Her greatest dream in life is that their home is filled with love and that God’s presence reigns therein.

loans.use: to install basic utilities at home.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Rosa de 47 años de edad, casado con Teofilo de 46 años, que fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos. JUntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Tarancato del distrito de Pichari. Rosa es una madre luchadora que dio todo por el bienestar de sus menores hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de café y cacao que se encuentra ubicado a media hora de camino de su comunidad. Ella trabaja en compañía de su esposo de manera coordinada, pero en épocas de cosecha siempre requiere de personales para que le puedan facilitar en la recolección de sus frutos. Rosa está contenta con esta labor que realiza, porque en estos últimos años su producto le esta dando buenos ingresos económicos, por lo que podría construir su vivienda de material noble, en un lote propio. Este seerá su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella está feliz y contenta con su banco comunal por que todos son buenos trabajadores y solidarios. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles realizará el mantenimiento de su campo agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Rosa, 47, is married to Teofilo, 46 and they have four children.  They live together in their own house located in the community of Tarancato in Pichari District.

Rosa is a tenacious mother who gave everything for her minor children’s wellbeing.  She grows coffee and cocoa beans on fields located half an hour from her community.  She works in a coordinated way alongside her husband but during harvesting she always needs extra staff to help facilitate picking the fruit.  Rosa is happy with the work she does because in the last few years the products have been generating good income which allowed her to build her house out of substantial building materials on a lot of her own.

This will be her second MFP loan and she commits to make her installment payments punctually.  She’s happy and content with her communal bank because all of them are good, supportive workers.  She will use the 2000 new soles to provide maintenance to her fields for which she will hire day laborers.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Claudia Dalila

texts.es:
La señora Claudia Dalila es casada, tiene 24 años de edad, cursó el segundo básico de educación, tiene 1 hijo que aun no estudia, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa típica para damas, inició este negocio gracias al apoyo de su esposo, lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo negocio.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compras de mercadería consistentes en: güipiles, blusas, cortes, suéteres, fajas, entre otros. Quiere que su negocio siga prosperando.
texts.en:
Claudia Dalila, 24, is married.  She completed second level of basic education.  She has a son that does not yet go to school.  She sells traditional women’s clothes.  She started the business thanks to support from her husband and has five years’ experience.  Her husband is in the same kind of business and supports her efforts.

She’s asking for a loan that she’ll use to buy merchandise consisting in: “güipiles” [traditional skirts], blouses, fabric, sweaters and sashes, among others.  She wants her business to continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
Este comité se formo en uno de los barrios de la ciudad de Caaguazú, son 22 mujeres quienes se agruparon para formar un  comité solidario, las mismas son señoras muy responsables y trabajadoras, poseen un espiritu emprendedor y de ayuda mutua. Actualmente estan en el 10° ciclo fortaleciéndose día a día para llegar a la meta y cumplir sus sueños y objetivos.
Gloria es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella tiene una pequeña peluquería en la cual trabaja todos los días, comenta que siempre tiene muchos clientes, lo cual le ayuda de sobremanera, ya que gracias a esto tiene los medios necesarios para poder mantener a su familia. Su objetivo es ir creciendo y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando en la casa.
Ella solicita la ayuda de la fundación para comprar insumos para su peluquería, como ser shampoo, enjuagues, baños de crema, tintes y demás insumos. Agradece por esta oportunidad de progreso que esta recibiendo por parte de fundación paraguaya y kiva.
texts.en:
This communal bank was formed in one of the neighborhoods of the city of Caaguazú. They are 22 women who got together to form a solidarity group. They are very hard-working and responsible women, who have a spirit of enterprise and helping one another. Currently, they are in their 10th loan cycle, getting stronger day by day, in order to reach their goals and fulfill their dreams and objectives. 

Gloria is a very hard-working woman, and has a small hair salon, where she works every day. She says that she always has a lot of customers, which helps her greatly, because thanks to this she has the means necessary to be able to support her family.

She is applying for the Foundation's help to buy supplies for her hair salon, such as shampoo, rinses, cream rinses, dyes, and other supplies. She is thankful for this opportunity for progress that she is receiving from Fundacion Paraguaya and Kiva.

loans.use: To buy shampoo, rinses, cream rinses, dyes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Victor Alfonso

texts.es: Desde hace 20 años, el señor Víctor labora en su taller de metalistería donde se dedica a la producción de herrajes, pines, argollas, entre otros productos. Víctor se ha reconocido por ser una persona muy trabajadora, y muestra de ello es que se ha desempeñado laboralmente en ebanisterías, carpinterías, soldadura, y otros oficios más. Víctor afirma, que todo esto lo hace por mantener a su familia con una buena calidad de vida, pues sus tres hijos y su esposa, son un motor para su trabajo y dedicación diaria. Víctor sueña con que su negocio crezca, con poder brindarles a sus hijos y su esposa una mejor calidad de vida, aspira a que su negocio se consolide y con sus ganancias pueda comprarse una casa nueva para sus hijos, y brindarles la mejor educación posible a ellos. En vistas de que su negocio de la metalistería está creciendo, Víctor busca un préstamo con el que pueda comprar una nueva lámina de aluminio y realizar el mantenimiento que requiere su soldadora, así podrá ofrecerles mayor calidad en los productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Victor has been working at his metal shop for 20 years. He does ironwork, and makes pins, rings, and other metal items. Victor has been known as a very hard-working person, as demonstrated by the fact that he has worked in cabinet-making, carpentry, welding, and other trades. 

Victor says that he does all this to support his family, and give them a good quality of life. His wife and three children are what drives his hard work and dedication every day.  

Victor dreams about his business growing, and being able to provide his wife and children with a better quality of life. His ambition is to build his business, and with his earnings buy a new house for his children, and offer them the best education possible. 



In light of the fact that his metal-working business is growing, Victor is looking for a loan with which to buy a new sheet of aluminum, and carry out maintenance that his welder needs. In this way, he will be able to offer better quality products to his customers.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal, and carry out maintenance on his welder.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William tiene 33 años, convive con Liliana de 26 años fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos con los que viven en su casa propia ubicado en la comunidad de Tarancato del distrito de Pichari. William es un hombre honesto en su trabajo, él se dedica al cultivo de cacao y café, que son productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado. Por ello tiene más de 10 años cultivando éste producto, aunque al principio estaba desanimado, porque aún no percibía los ingresos suficientes, y eso lo desanimaba continuar. Pero su querida esposa intervino, por lo que no permitió dejarlo; ya que William decidió inclusive vender su terreno agrícola. Ahora William agradece a su querida esposa que gracias a ella, logró mantener su parcela y actualmente esta recibiendo buenas ganancias de la producción de éste producto, por lo que ahora deesa ampliar la siembra. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará plantas de café para sembrarlos.
texts.en:
William is 33, and lives with his partner Liliana, 26. They have two children, with whom they live in their own house, located in the community of Taracato, in Pichari district. In his work, William is an honest man. He grows cacao and coffee, which are products with a lot of market demand. 

This is why he has been growing this product for more than 10 years, even though in the beginning he was discouraged, because he still wasn't earning enough income, and that discouraged him from continuing. 

William had even decided to sell his farmland, but his dear wife intervened and wouldn't let him give it up. Now William is grateful to his dear wife, because thanks to her, he managed to keep his parcel, and now he is getting good earnings from growing these crops.  

This why he now wishes to expand his plantation. This will be his second loan with MFP, so he promises to make his instalment payments on time. With the 2,000 nuevos soles, he will buy coffee seedlings for planting.

loans.use: To buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Tedis Estela

texts.es:
La joven señora Tedis tiene 23 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hija en casa de su madre y se dedica a la elaboracion de golosinas durante los meses en que comprende el año escolar, su clientes son los niños de la escuela de su comunidad, sin embargo durante la epoca que los niños no van a la escuela se dedica a vender ropa nueva y zapatos, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa y zapatos, desea invertir en zapatos colegiales y ropa tipo uniformes para los niños que estan por entrar a clases.
Su deseo es que su hija cresca sana y fuerte.
texts.en:
Tedis is a young woman of 23. She is a single mother, and lives with her daughter in her mother's house. She works making candy during the months that comprise the school year. Her customers are the school children in the community. 

However, during the time of year that the children don't go to school, she sells new clothing and shoes. She wishes to invest in school shoes, and uniform-type clothing for children who are about to start classes.

Her wish is for her daughter to grow up healthy and strong.

loans.use: To buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Nery Elias

texts.es:
El joven Nery Elias es soltero, tiene 21 años de edad, cursó los seis años de educación primaria, se dedica al tejido de cortes típicos, de diferente diseños, inició este negocio como operario, ya hasta ahora lleva 9 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores, y mejorar su producción de cortes, espera su negocio siga prosperando.
texts.en:
Nery Elias is 21 years old, single, and had six years of primary school education. He weaves traditional skirts of various designs. He began in this business as an operator, and has nine years of experience up to now.

He is applying for a loan in order to buy thread of various types and colors, and to improve his production of skirts.  He hopes that his business continues to prosper.

loans.use: To buy thread for weaving.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio tiene 60 años,  es viudo pero tiene 6 hijos, de las cuales vive solo con una de sus hijas menores en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Antonio es un hombre trabajador, se dedica al cultivo de cacao desde hace 40 años. Nos comenta que con esfuerzo y dedicación, todo se puede lograr en esta vida; algunas veces tuvo caídas de las cuales supo superarse y aprender de ello. Ahora tiene una hija por quien tiene una responsabilidad, pues esta en etapa escolar y por ello es que debe seguir trabajando para ayudarla con su esducación. Por ahora se encuentra de vacaciones, por lo que tiene más tiempo con ella, trabajndo juntos en el campo. Antonio está orgulloso por haber logrado casi todo lo anhelado en la vida, ya que a costa de muchos sacrificios a sabido educar a sus demás hijos. Antonio aparte de dedicarse a la agricultura tiene una tienda de abarrotes que le viene generando buenos ingresos. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas.  Con los 1,000 nuevos soles invertirá en los gasto de estudio de su hija.
texts.en:
Antonio, 60, is widowed but has six children. He only lives with one of them in his house, located in the district of Pichari. Antonio is a hard worker, and has been growing cocoa for 40 years. He says that anything can be achieved in life with effort and dedication. He has had his downfalls but has been able to get over them and learn something from them. 

He is now taking care of his daughter. She is going to school, so he needs to keep working to pay for her education. Right now, he is on holiday, so he has more time to spend with her. They work together in the farm. Antonio is proud to have achieved almost everything he set to do in life. By making a lot of sacrifices, he was able to educate his other children. 

Besides farming, he runs a grocery store which has been generating a good amount of income. This will be his second loan with MFP, so he commits to meet his installment payments on time. He will invest the 1000 nuevos soles in his daughter's education.

loans.use: To pay for his daughter's education.

loans.name: Santos Fernando

texts.es:
el joven Santos Fernando es soltero, tiene 14 años de edad, cursó su estudios de diversificado, es bachiller, se dedica a la sastrería a la confección de sudaderos, inicio este negocio gracias al apoyo de su señora madre, lleva 1 año de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas y también hilos, que le servirá para la confección de sudaderos y deportivo y casuales, quiere ver un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Fernando Santos, 14, is a High School graduate and works tailoring tracksuits. He has a one-year experience and learned the business thanks to his mother.

He is asking for a loan to purchase fabrics and threads, which he will use to tailor sport and casual tracksuits. He hopes that his business will be a successful one.

loans.use: To buy fabrics and threads to tailor tracksuits and pants.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María Francisca de 42 años de edad, es viuda pero 6 hijos con los que vive en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. María es una madre trabajadora, que después de la muerte de su esposo tuvo que sacrificarse bastante por sacar adelante a sus hijos. Ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes, es así que se levanta muy temprano para ordenar sus productos y limpiar su estableciemiento, así logra que sus clientes se sientan comodos y muy bien atendidos. Ella está feliz por todo lo que hasta ahora viene logrando, todo por el bienestar de sus queridos hijos, generalmente trabaja sola, pero sus hijos lo apoyan en la tarde después de sus labores educativas. En un futuro María desea incrementar su tienda con más prodcutos. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de productos para surtir su tienda.
texts.en: María Francisca is 42 years old. She is a widow but has 6 children. She lives with her children in a house of her own, located in the district of Pichari. María is a hard-working mother, and since the death of her husband she has had to sacrifice herself greatly to help her children get ahead. She has a grocery store, and so she gets up very early to set up her products and clean up her store. Thus she ensures that her customers feel comfortable and enjoy good service. She is happy about everything she has achieved up to now, which has all been for the well-being of her beloved children. She generally works alone, but her children help her in the evenings after their schoolwork is done. In the future, María would like to expand her store with more products. This will be her second loan with MFP, and she is committed to making her payments on time. With the 3,000 Peruvian new soles, she will buy products to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy more products to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and fungicides for his vegetables.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria Leonila se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a sacar adelante a sus 5 hijos. Desde hace poco más de 12 años, Maria Leonila se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal a través de catálogos, y de esta manera se gana los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su familia.
