Debido a que es separada de su pareja, Maria Leonila debe garantizarles el sustento a sus 5 hijos, y es por esto que siempre trabaja con más dedicación y con más esperanzas de mejorar su calidad de vida. Maria Leonila sueña con que su negocio crezca, con que le genere mayores ingresos y que pueda darle a sus 5 hijos todo lo que necesitan, empezando por la mejor educación posible. Maria Leonila, con esperanzas de aprovechar una promoción de su proveedor de productos de uso personal, busca un préstamo que le otorgue el capital necesario para realizar una compra por volumen que le garantice los precios bajos.
texts.en: Maria Leonila can be described as a very hardworking person and dedicated to doing the best for her 5 children. For a little more than 12 years, Maria Leonila has been selling cosmetics, shampoos, etc, from catalogs. This brings her the income she needs to support her family. Because she is separated from her partner, Maria Leonila has to ensure the livelihoods of her 5 children and this is why she always works with such dedication and so many hopes for improving their quality of life. Maria Leonila dreams that her business will grow so that she can increase her profits and be able to give her 5 children everything they need, beginning with the best possible education. Maria Leonila, hoping to take advantage of a promotion offered by her supplier, is looking for a loan that will give her the capital she needs to buy in bulk for a low price.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, shampoos, etc.

loans.name: Mariluza

texts.es: Mariluza tiene 30 años, es madre soltera con 02 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. El negocio al que se dedica es dar el servicio de fotocopiados de documentos. En un inicio se inico con una fotocopiadora pequeña en un ambiente muy reducido, pero gracias al credito adquirido con MFP, y el capital que ahorro se compró una maquina profesional y ahora le facilita los trabajos en menor tiempo e inclusive realiza  escaner, ampliaación. Durante las epocas escolares ella trabaja al costado de un colegio, cuyo local es alquilado, buen lugar para captar clientela y eso le generaba más ganancias. Durante el día trabaja sola, pero en las tardes la remplaza su hija mayor. Ella está contenta y agradecida con MFP, quien fue el que le dio la mano para poder crecer con su negocio, en un futuro desea construir su vivienda. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles comprará papel bond y tinta para la impresora.
texts.en: Mariluza is 30 years old and is a single mother with 2 children. They live together in her own home, located in the district of Pichari. The business that she runs is a document photocopying service. She began with a small photocopier in very small premises, but, thanks to loans from MFP and money that she had saved, she bought herself a professional machine and now she can complete jobs in a shorter time and she can scan and enlarge. During the school season, she works next to a high school in rented premises, and this is a good location for gaining customers and this means she generates good income. She works alone during the day, but her eldest daughter takes her place in the afternoons. She is happy and grateful to MFP, which was the organization that gave her a hand to be able to grow her business. In the future, she wants to build a house. This will be her second loan from MFP, and she promises to make her repayments on time. She will use the $375 to buy bond paper and printer ink.

loans.use: to buy bond paper and printer ink.

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es:
Doña Gloria, continua vendiendo en su pulperia, en donde su objetivo es invertir mas en productos, ya que tiene poco en mercaderia, ya que ha sido un año dificil para ella,  primeramente se enfermo de sus pies, y luego su hermano murio, en donde tuvo que hacer gastos.
Siempre cuenta con el apoyo economico de su esposo, quien vende productos lacteos, sus hijos trabajando, y hoy con esta nuevo financiamiento desea, comprar en mas cantidad, productos de granos basicos en quintales de arroz, frijoles, azucar, maiz, caja de jabon, bidon de aceite, golosinas, productos de la coca cola, cereales y otros que son mas demandados por los clientes.
Lo cual espera poder seguir equilibrando sus ventas y tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Gloria continues to sell goods in her grocery store, and her goal is to invest in more products as she doesn't have much in stock because it has been a difficult year for her. First, she had a problem with her feet, and later her brother died, and she had to make expenditures. 
She can always count on economic support from her husband, who sells dairy goods, and her working children. And now, with this new loan, she wants to buy in greater quantity goods such as staple grains, large quantities of rice, beans, sugar, corn, boxes of soap, oil, candies, Coca Cola products, cereals, and other things that are in demand from her customers.
She hopes to continue balancing her sales and to have better returns.

loans.use: to invest in staple grains, cereals, and candies so that she will have better sales.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy accessories for cell phones and watches.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina de 42 años convive con jorge de 27 años, fruto de este amor tienen 3 hijos con los que viven en una casa alquilada. Marina esta muy ansiosa porque pronto comprará su casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, generalmente lo vende en las ferias de su ciudad o de otras ciudades aledañas. Desde que se inicio en éste negocio, fue su esposo quien más la apoyo y a veces él tanto como ella se dirigen a distintas ferias para vender todo la mercadería que tienen. Así juntos traen el ingreso a casa, para que sus menores hijos puedan tener una mejor vida. Pues ahora ambos juntaron un pequeño capital con el que comprarán una vivienda, pues le falta para completar al tope del precio de la casa. Es por ello que decidieron sacar un credito de MFP, por tanto este será su primer credito por el que Marina estáa comprometida en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles completará en el pago de la compra de su vivienda.
texts.en: Forty-two-year-old Marina lives with 27-year-old Jorge.  They have three children whom they live with in a rented home.  Marina is very nervous because soon they will buy their own home.  She sells clothing for a living; generally she sells at fairs in either her city or neighboring cities.  Since she started this business, her partner was the one who supported her the most and sometimes he and she go different fairs to sell all of their merchandise.  Thus, together they are working on a deposit for their home, so that their young children will have a better life.  They have now saved a small amount of capital they will use to buy their home, but they still don't have enough to cover the price of the house.  That's why they decided to take out a loan with MFP.  This will be their first loan and Marina is committed to making her payments on time.  The 1,000 nuevos soles will cover the rest of the payment to purchase their home.

loans.use: to pay for part of the purchase of her home

loans.name: Ledy Lucía

texts.es: Emprendedora es la mejor palabra con la que se puede describir a Ledy Lucía. Hace poco inició su negocio de vender mercancía como ropa interior para dama con el fin de ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y de su hijo. Ledy Lucía, busca que en su hogar mejoren la calidad de vida en la que se encuentran actualmente, y sueña con que su hijo recién nacido tenga la mejor educación posible. Como su negocio lleva poco tiempo de haber iniciado, Ledy Lucía tiene poca mercancía para la venta, sin embargo, sus clientes si aumentan cada vez mas con el pasar de los días. Por esto, Ledy Lucía busca de un préstamo el cual le permita comprar mas mercancía para ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad. Ledy lucía espera que con una mayor variedad de productos, sus clientes aumenten sus compras y así pueda obtener los ingresos con los cuales cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en: Enterprising is the best word to describe Ledy Lucía.  A little while ago she started her business selling merchandise such as ladies' undergarments to help her husband with the household expenses and her son's needs.  Ledy Lucía is hoping to improve the quality of life in the home she currently lives in and dreams of offering her newborn son the best education possible.  As her business hasn't been open for very long, Ledy Lucía has little merchandise to sell.  However, every day she has more customers.  That is why Ledy Lucía is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy more merchandise to offer her customers a wider variety.  Ledy Lucía hopes that with a wider variety of products her customers will buy more and she will be able to make the income she needs to reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as underwear

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano de 60 años de edad, es viudo pero tiene 6 hijos, de las que solo 2 viven junto a él en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Mariano es agricultor, cultiva productos como el cacao y café desde ya hace 40 años en su parcela agrícola. Luego que su esposa falleciera tuvo que ser fuerte y reponerse, poniendlo toda su dedicación a su trabajo. Actualmente vive feliz, cultivando de la mano de peones que contrata, y le facilitan en la extracción de sus productos. En un futuro desea abrir una tienda para que pueda dejar las labores agrícolas ya que la  edad no le favorece, y así dejarle a sus hijos para que ellos continuen con esta labor. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por el que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles realizara el mantenimiento de su campo agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Mariano is 60 years old and he is a widower. He has 6 children, of whom only 2 live with him in their own house located in the district of Pichari. Mariano is a farmer. He has grown crops such as cocoa and coffee for the last 40 years in his agricultural plot. After his wife passed away he had to be strong and recover, committing himself to his job. Presently he lives happily, cultivating through hired labourers who aid in the extraction of the products.

In the future he hopes to open a shop so that he can leave his agricultural work as he isn't getting any younger. This way he can leave his children to continue with this work. This will be his second loan with MFP and he is committed to paying his quotas punctually. With the 3,000 PEN he will hire labourers to farm his agricultural land.

loans.use: to hire labourers.

loans.name: Henry Richard

texts.es:
Henry tiene 23 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, él nació en la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado pero vive en la ciudad de Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Henry trabaja en el terminal terrestre de la ciudad  del Cusco en una de las agencias de viajes en el área de venta de boletos. Ya son cinco años que trabaja en el terminal terrestre y le va muy bien. Henry y su esposa tienen un pequeño negocio familiar de venta de golosinas, tortas, café, jugos y mates. En esta oportunidad Henry requiere el préstamo para comprar productos como por ejemplo tortas, azúcar, harina, gaseosas y otras cosas más.

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Henry is 23 years old and he lives in a common-law marriage, from which he has one child. Henry was born in the city of Puerto Maldonado but he now lives in Cusco, where he carries out his economic activities. Henry works in the bus station of the city of Cusco in one of the travel agencies in the area of the ticket booths. He has been working there for the past five years and it is going well. Henry and his wife have a small family business selling candy, cakes, coffee, juices and mate. This time Henry needs a loan to buy products such as cakes, sugar, flour, sodas and other items.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" consists of responsible, hard-working people who help their families get ahead. The majority of its members live in the city of Cusco, where they carry out their economic activities. Cusco is renowned for being a tourist and commercial area, for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and because it is located near to one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy products such as cakes, sugar, flour, sodas and other items.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen Rosa tiene 44 años de edad y es padre y madre para sus dos hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Anta departamento del Cusco pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. Carmen Rosa tiene un pequeño cafetín en uno de los terminales terrestres de la ciudad del Cusco. Carmen Rosa en su pequeño cafetín vende jugos, mates, café, pastales, tortas, bebidas calientes y frías. En esta oportunidad Carmen Rosa requiere el préstamo para comprar productos como por ejemplo tortas, pasteles, gaseosas y otras cosas más.  

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa is 44 years old and is both father and mother to her two children. She was born in the province of Anta, in the department of Cusco but she now lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. Carmen Rosa has a small coffee shop in one of the bus stations of the city of Cusco. Carmen Rosa sells juices, mate, coffee, cakes, tortas and hot and cold drinks in her coffee shop. On this occasion Carmen Rosa needs a loan to buy products such as tortas, cakes, sodas and other items.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" consists of responsible, hard-working people who help their families get ahead. The majority of its members live in the city of Cusco, where they carry out their business activities. Cusco is renowned for being a tourist and commercial area, for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and because it is located near to one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy products such as tortas, cakes, soda and other items.

loans.name: Madeleyne

texts.es:
Madeleyne tiene 38 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Madeleyne trabaja en uno de los terminales terrestres de la ciudad del Cusco en una de las agencias de viajes en el área de venta de boletos de viajes. Madeleyne requiere el préstamo para uso personal como por ejemplo para la educación, alimentación de sus hijos.  

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Madeleyne is 38 years old and she has a domestic partnership that has produced two children.  She was born in the province and department of Cusco and she lives in the beautiful city in which she was born.  Madeleyne works selling tickets at a travel agency in one of Cusco's train stations.  Madeleyne needs this loan for personal use, such as the education and nourishment of her children.

The Nueva Esperanza Communal Bank is made up of responsible and hardworking people who get their families ahead.  Most of its members live and work in the city of Cusco.  Cusco is known for being a big tourist attraction, for its business, for its traditional Inti Raymi celebration, and because it is the location of one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to educate and feed her children

loans.name: Melisa Mariel

texts.es: Melisa de treinta años de edad vive con sus padres y sus dos  hijas. Ella posee una venta de ropa, camisas, blusas, pantalones, faldas entre otros, ya es muy conocida en la zona y últimamente ha aumentado su clientela pues lo que comercia es de excelente calidad, con precios accesibles y el servicio es inigualable; Melisa es una mujer muy trabajadora siempre se encuentra adelante de la competencia, su más grande secreto para llegar al éxito es la constancia y el amor en la labor que realiza, esta muy motivada y quiere ver crecer su negocio es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor blusas, vestidos, pantalones, camisas etc.  Melisa tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Thirty-year-old Melisa lives with her parents and her two daughters.  She sells clothing, such as shirts, blouses, pants, and dresses, among other things.  She is well known in her neighborhood and lately her clientele has expanded because what she sells is of excellent quality, her prices are affordable, and her service is incomparable.  Melisa is a very hardworking woman who is always ahead of the competition.  Her biggest secret for success is perseverance and love for the work at hand.  She is very motivated and she wants to see her business grow, which is why she decided to ask Apoyo Integral for a loan that will enable her to buy blouses, dresses, pants, shirts, etc. at wholesale.  Melisa is confident that this will enable her to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy blouses, dresses, pants, and shirts

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina tiene 39 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Paulina es profesora y tambien alquila carros. Paulina requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de los carros. 

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Thirty-nine-year-old Paulina has a domestic partner and three children.  She was born in the province and department of Cusco and she lives in the beautiful city in which she was born.  Paulina is a teacher and she also rents cars.  Paulina needs this loan to perform maintenance on her cars.

The Nueva Esperanza Communal Bank is made up of responsible and hardworking people who get their families ahead.  Most of its members live and work in the city of Cusco.  Cusco is known for being a big tourist attraction, for its business, for its traditional Inti Raymi celebration, and because it is the location of one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her cars

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga tiene 38 años de edad convive con Wilfredo de 40 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hermosas criaturas. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Olga está feliz con el trabajo que realiza, ella se dedica al cultivo de café y plátano con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Juntamente con su esposo, quien es el que siempre la apoya constantemente con los trabajos del campo, pero en ocasiones sale a trabajar como acerrador del que también obtienen un ingreso económico. Durante la temporada de cosecha contrata personales para que le puedan facilitar en la extracción de sus productos. En futuro Olga desea abrir una tienda donde pueda vender  sus productos de primera necesidad. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará una congeladora.
texts.en:
Olga is 38 years old and lives with her partner, 40-year-old Wilfredo.  The couple have two beautiful children.  They live together in their own home which is located in Pichari district.  Olga is happy with the work that she carries out.  She grows coffee and bananas and puts in a lot of hard work and commitment.  She works together with her husband who always supports her with her farming work but also sometimes goes out to work as a lumberjack which makes him additional income.  During harvest time, Olga hires staff so that she can gather in her produce more easily.  In the future, she would like to open a store where she can sell basic household products.

This will be Olga's second loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She will use the 3,000 soles to buy a freezer.

loans.use: to buy a freezer so that she can set up a grocery store

loans.name: Ruth Mery

texts.es:
Ruth Mery tiene 29 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Ruth Mery se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y damas, ella vende de forma ambulatoria en uno de las calles más concurridas en la ciudad del Cusco. Ruth Mery requiere el préstamo para comprar más ropa como buzos, medias, chompas, pantalones y otras cosas que se le agotaron. 

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Ruth Mery, 29, is in a common-law marriage and has two children.  She was born in Cusco department of Cusco and she lives in the beautiful city of her birth.  Ruth Mery sells children’s and women’s clothing as a street merchant on one of the busiest streets of Cusco.  She needs the loan to buy more clothing that she has run out of such as track suits, stockings, sweaters, pants and other items.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" is made up of hardworking and responsible people who strive to get their families ahead.  Most of the members live in Cusco where they work.  Cusco is known as a tourist destination and a business center, and for its traditional fiesta of  Raymi and because one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu" is found there.

loans.use: to buy more clothing that she has run out of  such as track suits, stockings, sweaters, pants, and more

loans.name: Zayra Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Zayra, sigue con su ventas de tortillas cada dia, palmea los tres tiempos, en donde sus ventas han aumentado, al igual que sus ingresos, logrando pagar sus gastos, y compra de sus insumos de materia prima.
Su vivienda la ha venido mejorando, con los financiamiento, gran parte la tiene de concreto, en donde dara la continuacion de seguir levantando paredes de concreto, que a un le falta en frente, asi como una pequeña cera, puertas, ventana. Logrando tener una mejor vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en: Doña Zayra continues to sell tortillas each day, patting them out by hand three times a day. Both her sales and her income have increased, allowing her to pay her bills and purchase raw materials. Her home improvements are coming along thanks to her loans. A large part of the home has already been concreted, so she will continue these improvements by putting up concrete walls at the front of her home, as well as a small fence, doors and window, allowing Zayra to provide her family with a decent home to live in.

loans.use: to purchase building materials to continue putting up concrete walls at the front of her home

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es:
Marilu tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera y aun no tiene hijos, ella nació en la provincia del Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Marilu se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas, caballeros y niños, ella no tiene un puesto de venta sino ella compra su mercadería de la ciudad de Lima y después distribuye a diferentes revendedoras. Marilu requiere el préstamo para comprar más ropa interior. Marilu también está estudiando la carrera profesional de contabilidad en una de las universidades particulares de la ciudad del Cusco. 

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Marilu is 19 years old. She is single and doesn't have any children. She was born in the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco and lives in the beautiful city where she was born. Marilu makes a living selling underwear for men, women and children. She doesn't have a stall but rather buys merchandise in the city of Lima and then distributes it to different retailers. Marilu needs the loan to buy more underwear. Marilu is also studying accountancy as a professional career in one of the private universities in the city of Cusco.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" consists of responsible, hard-working people who help their families get ahead. The majority of its members live in the city of Cusco, where they carry out their business activities. Cusco is renowned for being a tourist and commercial area, for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and because it is located near to one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy more underwear to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth Concepción

texts.es: Elizabeth Concepción de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de tortillas en el mercado cercano a la localidad donde reside, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el lugar es muy concurrido además su materia prima es de excelente calidad y vende a precios accesibles; Elizabeth es una mujer muy entregada a su trabajo, se levanta desde muy temprano para atender el negocio, ella piensa que el éxito no es la clave de la felicidad, sino que la felicidad es la clave del éxito, si amas lo que haces serás exitoso; Elizabeth quiere tomar ese camino porque ama su trabajo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Elizabeth Concepción tiene fe que con su esfuerzo logrará llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Elizabeth Concepción is 42 years old and lives with her partner and their children in their own home. She owns a stall selling tortas in the market close to the area where she lives. She has made many customers as the place is very busy. Also, her ingredients are top quality and she sells at reasonable prices. 

Elizabeth is a woman who is very devoted to her work. She gets up very early to care for her business. She thinks that success is not the key to happiness but rather that happiness is the key to success; if you love what you do, you will be successful. Elizabeth wants to take this road to success because she loves her job and this is why she requests a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy corn wholesale. Elizabeth Concepción has faith in that through her efforts she will manage to bring economic stability to her house and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
Mery tiene 38 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. Mery se dedica a la venta de cerveza, gaseosas y también vende comestibles, ella tiene una pequeña tienda donde expende sus productos. Mery requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de arroz, cerveza y gaseosas.

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Mery is 38 years old and lives with her partner, with whom she has two children. She was born in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco and she now lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. Mery makes a living selling beer, soda and foodstuffs. She has a small store where she sells her products. Mery needs this loan to buy commodities such as sacks of rice, beer and soda.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" consists of responsible, hard-working people who help their families get ahead. The majority of its members live in the city of Cusco, where they carry out their business activities. Cusco is renowned for being a tourist and commercial area, for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and because it is located near to one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy commodities such as sacks of rice, beer and soda.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Blanca Estela de treinta y tres años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su sobrino. Ella posee una venta de comida rápida, tortas, hamburguesas y hotdog; tiene muy buena fama en el lugar y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues vende la comida más exquisita, con una sabor inigualable, todo elaborado con material de excelente calidad y precios accesibles además el servicio es muy bueno, siempre recibe muy amable a las personas que la visitan. Blanca es una mujer muy dedicada en su trabajo, piensa que para llegar al éxito hay que estar siempre dispuestos a jugar las cartas que se nos presenten,  y ella quiere aprovechar esas oportunidades es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan, carnes, embutidos, verduras entre otros. Blanca Estela tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Blanca Estela, 33, lives with her life partner and her nephew.  She has a business selling fast food, such as sandwiches, hamburgers and hot dogs.  Her stand has a very good reputation in the area, and she has attracted a lot of customers because she sells the most delicious food, with a unique flavor, made from excellent quality ingredients and offered at reasonable prices.  In addition, her service is very good; she always provides a friendly welcome to the people who visit her stand.  Blanca is a woman who is very dedicated to her work.  She thinks that in order to become successful, one must always be ready to play the cards that are dealt, and she wants to take advantage of this opportunity.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy bread, meat, sausages, vegetables and other items.  Blanca Estela is hoping that in this way she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bread, meat, sausages and vegetables

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 26 años de edad y es soltero por lo tanto no tiene hijos, él nació en la provincia de Calca departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. Alejandro se dedica a brindar servicio de taxi en la ciudad del Cusco, él requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. 

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Alejandro, 26, is single and therefore has no children.  He was born in Calca province in the department of Cusco, and he lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  Alejandro has a business providing taxi services in the city of Cusco. He needs a loan to do maintenance work on his car.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza” is made up of hardworking and responsible people who are getting ahead with their families.  Most of the members live in the city of Cusco, and this is where they carry out their economic activities.  Cusco is known for being an area with a lot of tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festivities, and because it is the gateway to one of the Seven Wonders of the World: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on his taxi

loans.name: Silverio

texts.es:
Silverio tiene 48 años de edad y es casado y tiene dos hijos, él nació en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. Silverio trabaja en unos de los restaurantes más prestigiosos de la ciudad del Cusco, él es cocinero de profesión y desde hace mucho tiempo desempeña su profesión y le ha ido muy bien. Silverio requiere el préstamo para uso personal como para la ropa, educación de sus hijos. 

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Silverio is 48 years old. He is married and has two children. Silverio was born in Urubamba province, in the department of Cusco, and he lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.

Silverio works in one of the most prestigious restaurants in Cusco. He is a professional cook, he has been working in this job for a long time, and it has gone very well for him. Silverio needs the loan for personal use, for expenses like clothing and his children's education.

The “Nueva Esperanza” (New Hope) communal bank is made up of responsible, hardworking people who help their families get ahead. Most of the members live in the city of Cusco, and this is where they run their businesses. Cusco is known as an area for commercial activity and tourism. It is also known for its traditional "Inti Raymi" festival and because it is the site of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to cover personal expenses like clothing and education for his children.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela tiene 48 años de edad, es viuda y tiene seis hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. Graciela alquila carros a otras personas que brindan servicios de transporte urbano, ella alquila los carros a S/. 25.00 nuevos soles por todo el día. En esta oportunidad Graciela requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de los carros.  
 
El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Graciela is 48 years old. She is a widow and has six children. She was born in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco and she now lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. Graciela hires out cars to third parties who offer urban transport services. She rents out the cars for 25 PEN per day. On this occasion Graciela needs this loan in order to carry out repairs on her cars.

The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" consists of responsible, hard-working people who help their families get ahead. The majority of its members live in the city of Cusco, where they carry out their business activities. Cusco is renowned for being a tourist and commercial area, for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and because it is located near to one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to carry out car repairs.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:

En esta oportunidad Yanet requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como tintes, champús, peines, colorantes y otras cosas más.

It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world - Machu Picchu.

Yanet is 24 years old and single.  She was born in Cusco province, in Cusco department.  She lives in the beautiful city in which she was born.  Yanet is a beautician and has a beauty salon.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy work materials such as hair dyes, shampoos, combs, etc.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as hair dyes, shampoos, combs, etc.

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Karina tiene 26 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre, ella nació en la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Karina es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora  que trabaja en una casa haciendo limpieza. En esta oportunidad Karina requiere el préstamo para uso personal para compra comestibles para la casa.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Esperanza” (New Hope) community bank is made up of responsible and hard-working people who provide for their families.  Most of the members live in the city of Cusco and this is where they carry out their business activities.  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world - Machu Picchu.

Karina is 26 years old and lives with her common-law husband.  She was born in Cusco province, in Cusco department, and lives in the beautiful city in which she was born.  Karina is an enterprising and hard-working woman who works in a house, providing cleaning services.  On this occasion, Karina needs a loan for personal use (to buy food for her household).

loans.use: to buy food for her household

loans.name: Celso

texts.es: Celso, de 40 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador con muchas ganas de sobresalir, es soltero e independiente, vive en una casa alquilada en compañía de  04 amistades compartiendo los gastos mutuamente. La actividad que realiza Celso es la agricultura para eso se ha asociado con su padre quien tiene un terreno donde cultivan semilla y verduras. En el departamento de San Martín, lugar donde Celso invierte su capital para luego ver las ganancias obtenidas  por cada producción sacada a la venta  al mercado, siendo sus ganancias derivadas a sus necesidades. Lleva en este negocio cerca de 06 años, y hasta ahora le gusta su actividad pues comparte con su padre un negocio familiar, además que siente que los apoya y logra generarse un ingreso económico para pagar sus gastos personales. Comenta asimismo, que no le agrada cuando alguna plaga quiere malograr sus cosechas pero los combate a tiempo. Ahora con las ganancias que le deja su trabajo, tiene planes de abrir un restaurante en la ciudad ya que conoce  de cocina. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente contento y agradecido por el apoyo financiero para continuar con su negocio, además de sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes que en mayoría son sus vecinos y los considera ser personas responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles lo invertirá en el negocio que tiene en sociedad con su padre, pues comenta se acerca la fechas de siembra de semillas para un nueva producción.
texts.en:
40-year-old Celso is a hard-working man who has a great desire to do well in life.  He is single and independent.  He lives in a rental property, together with 4 friends, sharing expenses.  Celso's business is farming.  He works in company with his father who has a plot of land where they grow seeds and vegetables.  The land is located in San Martin department.  This is where Celso invests his capital.  He sees the profits that he makes from each harvest when he takes his produce to sell at market.  He uses his profits to cover his needs.  He has been in this business for nearly 6 years and, up to now, he has enjoyed working in his business as he shares the family business with his father.  He manages to make the income he needs to cover his personal expenses.  

Celso tells us that he doesn't like it when pests destroy his harvests but he combats them in a timely manner.  He now has plans to use the profits he makes in his work to open a restaurant in the city as he knows how to cook.  

This will be Celso's second loan from MFP.  He feels happy and grateful to be receiving financial support which will enable him to continue in his business.  He feels very much at ease with his community bank as he knows the other members.  They are mainly neighbors and he considers them to be responsible people.  Celso will invest the sum of 1,200 soles in the business he shares with his father as he says that it is time to sow seeds for a new growing cycle.

loans.use: to buy manure and vegetable seeds, and to hire laborers

El banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Carlos tiene 31 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene dos hijos, él nació en la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. On this occasion, he needs a loan for personal use, to buy clothes and food for his children and other things that they need at home.

loans.use: to buy clothes and food for his children

loans.use: to have his car serviced

loans.name: Rosa Agripina

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Maluay, vive por la comunidad Maluay, que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió y se caracteriza por la belleza de la naturaleza y su estructura arquitectónica que es una mezcla lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente labora en el comercio, cría de animales y en la agricultura, también laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas.

Doña Rosa tiene 55 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos que son mayores de edad, trabajan y le ayudan económicamente. Su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora. Rosa es costurera y labora en su casa, su especialidad es coser sacos y ternos de mujer, se encuentra en el negocio hace 17 años, este oficio lo aprendió trabajando. Como pasa en casa también se dedica a la cría de  borregos y cerdos.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción para arreglar su casa.
 
Su meta es terminar el arreglo de su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the Maluay community bank.  She lives in Maluay, in El Valle parish, in Cuenca.  This is a cold-climate area and it is noted for its natural beauty and its architecture which is a mixture of colonial and modern buildings.  The locals work in commerce, livestock raising and farming.  They also work in different business activities in the city.

Rosa is 55 years old, married, and has two grown-up children.  Her children work and help her financially.  Her husband is a farmer and they own their own home.

Rosa is a seamstress and she works from home.  Her specialty is sewing women's bags and suits.  She has been in this business for 17 years.  She learned the trade from working in it.  While she works from home, she also raises lambs and pigs.

Rosa has been a member of her community bank for three years and she will invest her new loan in buying building supplies to fix up her home.  Her goal is to finish repairing her home.

loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Banco Comunal La Esperanza Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal La Esperanza está conformado por 12 integrantes en el cual ya han atenido crédito con Fundación León, este grupo son emprendedores que día a día lucha por sacar a su familia a delante, la presidenta de este grupo los motiva para que sigan adelante con sus negocios y generar ingresos a la familia. Santos Ramona es parte del grupo en el cual su actividad económica es la venta de ornada, esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulante en la localidad donde ella habita. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para comprar materia prima y poder incrementar el negocio.
texts.en: The 'La Esperanza' (Hope) community bank has 12 members who have already received a loan from Fundación León.  The members of this group are entrepreneurs who work hard every day to provide for their families.  The group's president encouraged them to make progress in their businesses and make income for their families.  Santos Ramona is a member of this group.  Her business activity is selling decorations.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor in the local area.  She is currently requesting this loan to buy raw materials so that she can increase her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: María Rosario

texts.es:
La Señor María es socia del banco comunal Maluay, vive por la comunidad Maluay que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, y se caracteriza por la belleza de la naturaleza y su estructura arquitectónica que es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente labora en el comercio, cría de animales y en la agricultura, también laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas.

La Señora María tiene 34 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos  de 12, 10 y 2 años de edad y sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo  labora en una sastrería, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
Doña María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como pasa en casa cría pollos y cuyes, también trabaja en la agricultura, siembra hortalizas y su cosecha la vende en su parroquia. En sus tiempos libres se dedica a la elaboración de sombreros de paja toquilla.
 
Es socia de la banca comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en alimento para los mismos.

Su meta es tener un negocio más grande de cría de animales.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Maluay community bank.  She lives in Maluay, in El Valle parish, in Cuenca.  This is a cold-climate area and it is noted for its natural beauty and its architecture which is a mixture of colonial and modern buildings.  The local people work in commerce, livestock raising and farming.  They also work in different business activities in the city.

María is 34 years old, married, and has three children who are 12, 10 and 2 years old.  Her two eldest children attend a local school.  Her husband works in a tailor's workshop.  They own their own home.

María takes care of her home and raises chickens and guinea pigs.  She also farms.  She grows vegetables and sells her harvests in her parish.  In her free time, she makes Panama hats.

María has been a member of her community bank for three years and she will invest her new loan in buying chickens and chicken feed.

María's goal is to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora Mariana es socia del banco comunal Maluay, vive por la comunidad Maluay que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, y se caracteriza por la belleza de la naturaleza y su estructura arquitectónica que se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente labora en el comercio, cría de animales y en la agricultura, también laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas.

Doña Mariana tiene 60 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, solteros y trabajan para sus gastos personales. Su esposo labora en la agricultura, la casa en la que viven es la recompensa del trabajo en su juventud.
 
La Señora. Mariana se dedica a la agricultura y  sus cosechas son para su consumo. A veces labra terrenos de otras personas cuando le llaman. También cria ganado y cuyes y en sus tiempo libre se dedica a tejer sombreros de paja toquilla.
 
Es socia fundadora  del banco comunal  y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes y pollos para engordarles y venderlos.
 
Su sueño es  terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Mariana is a member of the Maluay communal bank. She lives near the community of Maluay, which is part of the Valle parish in Cuenca canton. This is a place with a cold climate, and is noted for the beauty of its natural setting, and for its architecture, which is a mix of the colonial and the modern. Its people have businesses, raise animals, and farm. They also work in the city in various livelihoods.

Mariana is 60, and married. She has three children who are now adults. They are single, and work to meet their personal expenses. Her husband is a farmer. The house where they live is the reward for the work of their youth.
 
Mariana is a farmer, and her harvests are for her own use.  Sometimes she works on other people's land when they call on her. She also raises livestock and guinea pigs, and in her free time weaves toquilla straw hats (also known as Panama hats). 

She is a founding member of the communal bank, and is going to use her new loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens to fatten and sell. Her dream is to finish her house.

loans.use: To buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Luisa Veronica

texts.es: Luisa Verónica tiene 40años de edad, es una persona asalariada en el cual se desempeña como secretaria ejecutiva de una empresa, su mayor sueño es de acondicionar su vivienda pero no ha tenido muchos recursos para poder  hacerlo debido a que el poco salario que devenga no le permite acondicionarla. Luisa Verónica está solicitando financiamiento para acondicionarla en lo cual comprara con el préstamo perlines y zinc entre otros.
texts.en: Luisa Verónica is 40 years old.  She works for a salary, as an executive secretary.  Her biggest dream is to do up her home.  However, she hasn't had enough resources to do this owing to the low salary that she earns.  Luisa Verónica is requesting a loan so that she can do up her home.  She will use her loan to buy beams, sheets of metal roofing, etc.

loans.use: to buy beams and sheets of metal roofing, etc.

loans.name: Saida Patricia

texts.es:
La Señora. Saida es socia del banco comunal Las Cuencanitas, vive por el sector de los Eucaliptos en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, en Diciembre de 1999 fue nombrada Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente mantienen la Cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
 
Doña Saida tiene 38 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 18 años de edad que estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora Saida es de profesión costurera, esta actividad la desempeña desde su casa en sus tiempos libres. Hace 7 meses labora como empleada privada.

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su tercer crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales para su negocio de la costura como es telas e hilos.
 
Su meta es tener un vehículo.
texts.en:
Saida is a member of the "Las Cuencanitas" communal bank. She lives in the Eucaliptos area of the city of Cuenca.  Cuenca is known as Santa Ana de los Cuatro Rios, and in December 1999, was designated as the Cultural Heritage of Humanity. Its people maintain the culture and traditions of their peoples.
 
Saida is 38, divorced, and has an 18 year-old son who goes to a high school in the city. The house where she lives belongs to her.

Saida is a seamstress by trade,, and carries on this activity in her free time from her home. She has been employed by a private company for seven months.

She is in her third loan with the communal bank, and is going to use it to buy materials for her business, such as fabric and thread.

Her goal is to have a vehicle.

loans.use: To buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Johanna Katherine

texts.es:
La Señora. Johanna es socia del banco comunal Las Cuencanitas, vive por el sector de los Eucaliptos en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, en Diciembre de 1999 fue nombrada Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente mantienen la Cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
 
La Señora. Johanna tiene 19 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 2 hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita. Su esposo labora en un taller de mecánica industrial, no tiene casa propia y vive arrendando. 
 
Ella se dedica a la venta de juguetes y confitería esta actividad la realiza hace un año. También labora en un local de CD de música y películas, encontrándose en esta actividad hace un año y trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que se encuentra en la banca comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de juguetes y confitería para su negocio.
 
Su meta es darles la mejor educación a sus hijos para que se superen y salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Johanna is a member of the "Las Cuencanitas" communal bank. She lives in the Eucaliptos area of the city of Cuenca. Cuenca is known as Santa Ana de los Cuatro Rios, and in December 1999, was designated as the Cultural Heritage of Humanity. Its people maintain the culture and traditions of their peoples.
 
Johanna is 19, and in a common-law relationship. She has two children, ages four and two. Her first child goes to pre-school. Her husband works in an industrial mechanical workshop. They don't have their own house, and rent instead.

She sells toys and sweets and has been doing this for a year. She works from Sunday to Sunday, with no fixed hours. She is in her third loan cycle with the communal bank, and she is going to use the money to buy toys and sweets for her business. Her goal is to provide her children with a better education, so they can excel, and get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy toys and sweets.

loans.name: Arnold

texts.en:
Arnold is married with four children. Arnold is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Arnold is operating a retail business, selling a variety of home products to local community members to earn a living. He has been in business for three years and every month he earns PHP 3,000 from this work. He has requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase additional products to sell.

In 2011, Arnold joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help him improve his business and living situation. In the future, Arnold hopes to double his business income and for his children to finish their schooling.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Magdalena

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Las Cuencanitas, vive por el sector de los Eucaliptos en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, en Diciembre de 1999 fue nombrada Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente mantienen la Cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
 
Doña Rosa tiene 57 años, es madre soltera de 4 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, están casados y tres de ellos viven independientes, una de sus hijas casadas vive en su casa y comparten los gastos del hogar. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
La Señora. Rosa se dedica a la venta de frutas, esta actividad la realiza hace 20 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo en un mercado de la ciudad sin un horario fijo.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de frutas para continuar con su negocio. 

Su sueño es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the “Las Cuencanitas” communal bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca’s Los Eucaliptos zone.  Cuenca, a city known as Santa Ana de los Cuatro Ríos, was designated in 1999 as a Cultural Heritage of Humanity.  Its residents maintain the culture and traditions of its peoples.

Rosa is 57 years old and a single mother of four children who are married adults now.  Three of them live independently and one of her married daughters lives at home with her sharing expenses.  She does not own a house; she rents.

Rosa sells fruit, an activity she’s been in for 20 years.  She works Sunday to Sunday in a municipal market and has no fixed work schedule.

She’s in her third loan with the communal bank and will use it to buy fruit to continue with her business.  Her dream is to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is married with 1 child. Analiza is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. 

Analiza operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's had this business for 3 years. Every month, she earns PHP 1,500 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 4,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. 

In 2008, Analiza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Analiza hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in her business

loans.name: Andrea Carolina

texts.es:
Andrea de 23 años es una joven a la que le gusta mucho escuchar música y como buena peruana es fanática del suculento “Arroz con Pollo”, este plato se encuentra entre los más populares no sólo de la región si no del país entero, actualmente ella vive en la ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por el incremento de inversión y la inauguración de nuevos centros comerciales, las que permiten a muchas personas obtener un empleo fijo donde son remunerados con todos los beneficios que dicta la ley peruana, en este nuevo gran mercado iqueño, vive y trabaja Andrea, que día a día se empeña para poder salir adelante.

Esta joven nos comentó que le hubiese gustado poder estudiar obstetricia, debido a algunos percances familiares y personales no pudo lograr esta meta, pero ella estaba segura que podría dedicarse a otra actividad y que saldría adelante, que ganaría el dinero suficiente para poder cubrir sus necesidades, es así como decide dedicarse a vender ropa y zapatos, este negocio le permite ganar entre S/.40 a S/.55 diarios, ella sabe que poco a poco su número de clientes empieza a incrementarse y es por esto que su negocio empieza a tener éxito.

Actualmente ella tiene una nueva idea en mente para su negocio, pero los ingresos que tiene lo le han permitido juntar el dinero suficiente para poder comprar al por mayor y obtener un precio preferencial, es por esto que solicitó el apoyo de Kiva para poder cumplir este objetivo y así comprar ropa de verano, ella sabe que este producto se venderá por si solo muy rápido, debido a las altas temperaturas que afronta la ciudad de Ica constantemente, sus ciudadanos prefieren la ropa fresca.
Su sueño es poder poner una tienda en un mercado de la ciudad y es consciente de que sólo así empezará a tener un trabajo estable que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Andrea, 23, is a young woman who very much enjoys listening to music and as a good Peruvian is a big fan of delicious “Arroz con Pollo,” a dish which is one of the most popular ones not only in the region but throughout the country.  She currently lives in the city of Ica which is characterized by an increase in investment, the opening of new commercial centers which allow many people to obtain steady jobs with salaries that include all the benefits mandated by the laws of Perú.  In this new Ica marketplace, Andrea lives and works and strives daily to get ahead.

She told us that she would have liked to study Obstetrics but due to family and personal mishaps was unable to reach this goal.  But, she was sure that she could go into another activity and get ahead, that she could earn enough money to cover her needs.  This is how she decided to go into clothing and shoe sales.  This business allows her to earn between 40 and 55 soles daily.  She knows that the number of her customers is gradually increasing and her business is starting to be successful.

She currently has a new idea for the business but the income she’s earned has not been sufficient for her to be able to save up enough to buy at wholesale thus obtaining preferential prices.  Because of this, she’s asked for Kiva's help to reach this goal and buy summer clothes.  She knows that this product will practically sell itself quickly.  Because of the high temperatures Ica faces constantly, its residents prefer cool clothing.

Her dream is to be able to open a store in the municipal market and she’s aware that only thus will she have stable work that will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes to sell.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is married and has seven children. Carmen is 45 years old. She lives in Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Carmen owns and operates a business venture, selling seafood products, including fish, in the local community to earn a living. She's been in this business for seven years. Each month, she earns PHP 2,000 doing this type of work. She requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase additional fish to sell. 

In 2011, Carmen joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Carmen wants to build a house and to finish the study of her children.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is married with 3 children. Rufina is 34 years old. She lives in Militar, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Rufina operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been in this business for 3 years. Every month, she earns PHP 2,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. 

In 2010, Rufina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Rufina hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in her business

loans.name: 0201021-Hợp Tân-Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Minh operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish sauce. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish sauce to resell. 

Minh is 55 years old and she is married with 4 children. She is the leader of a 8-member group, the 0201021-Hợp Tân Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2010, Minh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Minh has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Minh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Minh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Minh hopes to buy land of her own, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: To purchase fish sauce to resell.

loans.name: 03.05.121 Thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên Lê  works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase pigs to raise and sell in future.

Liên Lê is 61 years old and she is married with 3 children. Liên Lê is the group leader of the 03.05.121 Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2003, Liên Lê joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Liên Lê  has successfully repaid 7 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Liên Lê  has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Liên Lê faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Liên Lê hopes for her business to do well, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: To purchase pigs to raise.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida, a 44-year-old widowed woman who has 4 children. She is a resident of Campo 1, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur.

Zenaida, plants, harvests, and sells rice in order to make a living. For 18 years she's been in this business. Each month she gains 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) from this work, which is enough to finance her family's daily needs. 

Zenaida requests a loan of 30,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She joined GDMPC in 2011 to seek guidance and assistance. Positively, she hopes to progress her business to supplement her family's needs.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer, such as manure.

loans.name: 04.10.4 Nam Ngạn Thanh Hóa Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên is 50 years old and she is married with 3 children. Liên lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Mrs. Liên operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. The main harship that Liên faces in her business is the lack of capital. Liên is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make processed food to sell. With her business profit, she hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find a good job, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

Liên is the leader of a 5-member group, the 4 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. In 2010, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Liên has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make processed food to sell

loans.name: Touch

texts.en: Touch, 42, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish for over ten years and is successful in her career. Her husband is a sub leader in the village. One of her children is a driver. Selling fish is the main source of income in the family. Therefore, in order to improve her family finances, Touch is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to use in her business for transporting fish to sell at the market. By doing so, she would easily transport her fish to sell and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business by a large amount. In addition, she plans to build a kitchen and support her youngest child to study at a higher level.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to use in her business for transporting fish to sell at the market

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is a married woman who has five children. Merlyn is 48 years old and resides in Taguitic, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte, Philippines. 

Merlyn own and operate a nipa-making (weaving nipa palm to make roofing materials) business venture to earn a living and she's been in this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns 2,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 15,000 to purchase additional raw materials to expand product offerings. 

In 2011, Merlyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Merlyn wants to make improvements of her house and expand/improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials to expand product offerings

loans.name: 4.2.3 Nam Ngạn Thanh Hóa Group

texts.en:
Vinh is 41 years old and she is married with 2 children. She lives with 2 dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Mrs. Vinh has a retail business selling medication. Vinh has been involved in this business for 4 years. The main harship that Vinh faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase medicine to resell.
She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 2.3 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. 

In 2008, Vinh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Vinh has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Vinh hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase medicine to resell

loans.name: Ki

texts.en: Ki, 31, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for over a year. Her husband is a truck driver. Since the factory is far away from home, Ki is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike to commute to work. By doing so, she would go to work on time and reduce her transportation expense. In the future, she would like to run a grocery shop and support her children to study until they get a Bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute to work

loans.name: 060302-Đại Long-Hoằng Châu-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Giới works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise.

Giới is 36 years old and is married, with two children.
She is the leader of a four-member group, the 060302-Đại Long-Hoằng Châu-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. 
She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoá province, with two dependents.

In 2003, Giới joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Giới has successfully repaid six loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Giới has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Giới faces in her business is lack of capital.

In the future, Giới hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle to raise.

loans.name: Markel

texts.en:
Markel is married, with one child. He is 27 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.

Markel operates a general store, selling a variety of products to members of the local community to earn a living. He has been doing this for four years and every month, he earns 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell.

In 2011, Markel joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. Markel hopes to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Saroeurng

texts.en: Saroeurng, 41, is married and resides with her husband and six children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working as a weaver for over seven years and is successful in her career. Her husband is construction worker. Her daughter is a garment worker. Since the factory is far away from home, Saroeurng is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase a motorbike for her daughter to commute to work. By doing so, her daughter would easily go to work on time and save some money on her transportation expense. In the future, Saroeurng would like to build a new house and support her children to study until they get Bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her daughter to commute to work.

loans.name: Rodelrick

texts.en:
Rodelrick is married, has 2 children, and he is 31 years old and residing at San Vicente, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines.

He is operating a raising crops venture, planting & harvesting rice for sale in the local community to earn a living. He has been 5 years in this business. Each month, he earns about 10,000 PHP doing this type of business.

He requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure. In 2011, Rodelrick joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. In the future, he wants to save profits as a reserve for future emergencies and to purchase another farm land.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

location.town: San Vicente, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Crecencia

texts.en: Crecencia, a 57-year-old married mother of four children, lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Crecencia used her last loan to purchase more crabs to sell. But now, she's operating another business in nipa hut making (materials from the nipa palm). She's taking a new loan to purchase additional raw materials to expand her product offerings. Crecencia hopes to increase her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials to expand her product offerings.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:

She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2004. In the future, Fe hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy raw ingredients for making meals. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Lucita hopes to improve her business.

Siony has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Siony hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Raymundo has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Raymundo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Anabella has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Anabella hopes to improve her business.

Milagros has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Milagros hopes to improve her business.

Diamond is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has one child. 

Diamond has a retail shop that sells bags, clocks and shirts. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy a stock of products to sell such as bags, clocks and shirts.

Diamond is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Diamond hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of products to sell such as bags, clocks and shirts.

loans.name: Phoebe

texts.en:
Eva is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children. 

Eva has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Eva is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Eva hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children.
 
Eva has a tailoring shop that makes and sells school uniforms, sport uniforms and office uniforms. She has had this business for five years. 

She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy materials needed for the tailoring shop.

Eva is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Eva hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for the tailoring shop.

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has three children.
 
Perla has a food shop or sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Perla has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Perla hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Marifel

texts.en:
Marifel is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children.
 
Marifel has a food shop or sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for three years. 

She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Marifel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Marifel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.en:
Bibiana is a 24-year-old married woman with two young children, age 4 and 2. She and her husband run a fishing business in their town.

According to Bibiana, this business has been running for five years now. Her husband operates their fishing boat and Bibiana sells his catch at the market. Each month, they earn about 7,000 PHP with their business. Bibiana does her best to improve their income and take care of her children. 

She has requested this loan to purchase fishing nets, hooks and other materials.

In the future, Bibiana hopes to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets, hooks and other materials.

loans.name: Cristituta

texts.en:
Cristituta is 41 years old and is a married woman with a 22-year-old child. Her husband works as a carpenter and fisherman.

Cristituta has been selling fish for 15 years. She buys from fishermen at her town and sells fish at the market. Cristituta also supports her husband in selling his catch. Cristituta works hard to improve her family's quality of living.

Cristituta has requested this loan to buy ice boxes and fishing materials such as nets, hooks and baits. She hopes for this loan to help improve their business.

loans.use: to buy ice boxes and fishing materials such as nets, hooks and baits.

loans.name: Erlina

texts.en:
Erlina, 36, is a married woman with four children, age 15 to 10 years old. Erlina and her husband run a fishing business in their town.

Erlina's husband operates their fishing boat. Erlina is in charge of selling her husband's catch at the market. Erlina also dries fish to sell. She works hard to support her family and keep her children in school.

Erlina has requested this loan to buy nets, hooks, bait and other fishing materials. This will help Erlina and her husband have more fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy nets, hooks, bait and other fishing materials.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en: Chona is a married woman living in Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She has two school-aged children. Chona used her last loan to purchase spare parts and pay for repair costs for the motorbike. Her business is successful, so she is taking a new loan to purchase an additional motorbike. She hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional motorbike.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca earns a living selling RTW (ready-to-wear) clothes and Avon products to her community. She is 43 years old, married and has five school-aged children. Francisca's husband works as a fisherman.
