loans.use: to purchase safety bars, carpets, toys and equipment and renovate rooms used for daycare.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor, de 47 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador  y empeñoso, además de solidario y amable con muchos deseos de superación, está casado con Beatriz quien es empleada, fruto de esa unión tiene 02 hijos de 11 y 7 años de edad, al los que quiere mucho, habitando cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Víctor es el dar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en un motocarro que se compró con el fruto de sus ahorros más un crédito particular. Iniciándose en este negocio hace 10 años y en el transcurso del tiempo fue renovando piezas y repuestos mientras se deterioraban por el uso cotidiano. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual pueda solventar sus gastos familiares. Ahora se siente con mayor seguridad pues puede manejar sus propios tiempos, además de ser su propio jefe. Por lo contario comenta que no le gusta cuando su mototaxi se malogra muy seguido pues le ocasiona muchos gastos, pero aún así logra ver buenas resultados, por eso tiene planes de crecer y poder comprarse un vehiculo de transporte de carga pesada. Por otro lado dese incursionar en la venta de ropa para tener más ganancias y su esposa pueda manejar el negocio, mientras él continua ofreciendo el servicio de transporte. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo para poder alcanzar sus objetivos. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues se lleva bien con todos sus miembros a los que considera ser buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería como ropa masculina para incursionar en la venta de ropa, pues un prima se dedica a éste rubro y por tanto le ayudará a él y a su esposa incursionar en éste nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Victor is 47 years old. He is a hardworking man, in addition to being supportive and friendly, with many desires to overcome obstacles. He is married with Beatriz who is employed. The fruit of this union are his 2 children who are 11 and 7 years old, whom he loves very much. He lives comfortably in his own home. 

The activity that Victor currently pursues is to give transportation services to passengers in a car that he bought with the sum of his savings plus a particular loan. He initiated this business 10 years ago and in the time that has passed he has replaced pieces and parts while it deteriorates because of its daily use. He likes his business because it permits him to have an economic income with which to resolve the family expenses and he began it because of the necessity to count on an economic income when he could not find a job. Now he feels there is more security because he can manage his own hours, in addition to being his own boss. 

On the contrary, he comments that he does not like it when his taxi is broken too often because it leads to many expenses, but still he can see good results, for this reason he has plans to grow and be able to buy a transport vehicle for heavy cargo. 

On the other hand, he wants to venture into the sale of clothing to obtain more wages. This will be his second loan with the institution MFP. He feels grateful for the financial support that he is receiving to be able to achieve his objectives. Moreover, he comments that he feels that he likes his communal bank because it treats all of its members well and he considers them to be good people. With the amount that he solicits of 1500 nuevos soles, he will invest it in the purchase of merchandise, like men's clothing which is an idea that his cousin gave him who also sells clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men.

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Rebeca tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en el distrito de Sicuani de la provincia de Canchis departamento del Cusco pero vive en la hermosa ciudad de Calca. Su actividad económica principal de Rebeca es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche, panes, fideos, aceites, conservas, papel higiénico y muchas cosas más. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Rebeca requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
The Andrés Avelino Cáceres communal bank is made up of hardworking and responsible people who strive to get their families ahead.  Most of the members live in Cusco where they work.  Cusco is known as a tourist and commercial area, famous for its Inti Raymi festival and because one of the seven wonders of the world, Machupicchu, is found there.

Rebeca, 34, is in a common-law marriage and they have two children.  She was born in Sicuani district of Canchis province, Cusco department but she lives in the beautiful city of Calca.  Her main work is selling staples items such as rice, sugar, milk, bread, pasta, oil, conserves, toilet paper and more.  She has been in this business for two years and it’s going very well.  At this time Rebeca needs a loan to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, pasta, and more.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, pasta, and more

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Mari a Isabel es una emprendedora  que su actividad económica  a la que se dedica es a una pulpería en el cual se le ha brindado financiamiento para invertir en el negocio y ella nos expresa que con financiamiento a aumentado su inventario y sus clientes de igual manera. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertir nuevamente en la compra de capital trabajo como granos básicos, golosinas refrescos, pan, detergentes, entre otras productos.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is an entrepreneur.  She has a general store, and she has used a loan to invest in her business.  She tells us that with the loan she has increased her inventory and her customers.

She is currently requesting a loan to once again use it as working capital to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and other products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and other products.

loans.name: Saida

texts.en:
Saida is a 52-year-old widow from northern Israel. She began selling baked goods, pickles and other food products from her home to a few customers from the area. Saida decided she wanted to develop her skills and create a business activity. She began focusing on her baked goods. 

Saida has expanded her customer base and has gained a strong, loyal clientele. After much urging by her customers, who wanted to purchase more of her products, Saida decided to professionalize her business.

She needed this loan to purchase a professional stove, a refrigerator, supplies and packaging for her baked goods.

Saida wants to continue to develop and improve her products. She wants to take baking and pastry classes from the Carmel Chef  School.

loans.use: To purchase a professional stove, a refrigerator, supplies and packaging for her baked goods.

loans.name: Silueta De Cristal Group

texts.es:
El grupo Silueta de cristal lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Ivania del Socorro quien tiene un taller de calzado el cual inicio hace un año junto a su esposo Juan. Ellos distribuyen su producto en Managua, León y Rivas  e invertirá el crédito en charol, pega, azulón, plantillas, suelas, montado y alistado…etc. 

Las otras integrantes son Ivania  quien se dedica al comercio de bebidas nacionales pozol, tiste y a la venta de verduras y Juan quien se dedica a la realización de calzado desde hace 7 años  y los comercializa en Granada y Managua.
texts.en:
The Silueta de Cristal communal bank is comprised of three hard-working and enterprising people.

Ivania del Socorro has a footwear shop, which she started a year ago with her husband, Juan.  They distribute their products in Managua, León, and Rivas.  She will use the loan to buy patent leather, glue, dye, insoles, soles, lasting, and other supplies.  

Ivani is another member.  She sells traditional drinks like “pozol” (corn based drink) and “tiste” (a drink made from corn and cocoa).  She also sells vegetables.  

Juan, who has been making shoes  for 7 years and sells them in Managua and Granada.

loans.use: to buy patent leather, glue, dye, insoles, soles, lasting, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ana Elizabet

texts.es:
La socia anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio de venta de colchas y lanas pero no le fue muy bien,ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de venta de repuestos para computadoras,ella tiene un tienda en la ciudad de Cusco,la socia tambien se esta dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar la tienda de venta de repuestos de computadora.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para las computadoras y tambien para comprar animales como cuyes y gallinas.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Elizabet used to work in the business of selling bedspreads and woolen yarns, but it didn’t go well for her. Now she is in the business of selling replacement parts for computers. She has a store in the city of Cusco. She also is working in the business of raising animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. Via these businesses, she is able to provide for her children. Her dream is to expand her computer parts store. She is requesting the loan to buy replacement parts for computers and also to buy animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. 

She is happy because of the loan and she pledges to make her repayments.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for computers and also to buy animals such as guinea pigs and chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To renovate the area of her store and purchase supplies and stock.

loans.name: Jhonatan

texts.es: Jhonatan, de 22 años de edad, es un joven con muchos deseos de salir adelante, trabajador y empeñoso, es soltero, vive en compañía de sus 05 hermanos, sus padre, su madre, a los quiere mucho y se esfuerza por ser el orgullo de su familia. Ahora habita cómodamente la casa de sus padres. La actividad que realiza Jhonatan es la venta de bebidas gaseosas heladas al por mayor por cajas y por unidades para llevar, desde la casa de sus padres donde cuenta con una congeladora de regular tamaño, para enfriar sus bebidas y venderlas al gusto de sus clientes. Desde hace 01 año que se dedica a éste negocio, donde atiende muy amablemente él solo y en ocasiones sus hermanos lo ayudan cuando está fuera de casa. Le gusta su negocio ya que le permite tener un ingreso económico para pagar sus gastos personales  y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar además de la  libertad financiera e independencia, deseando poder convertirse en prospero empresario. Ahora viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo, desea continuar con su negocio queriendo ampliarlo y incrementar el volumen de su stock de mercadería. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues considera  a sus integrantes ser personas amable y solidaria. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de más bebidas a precio por mayor y así tener mejores ganancias, y de diversas marcas y presentaciones para atender mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jhonatan, at 22 years old, is a youth who is very eager to get ahead, by working and persevering. He is single and lives with his 5 siblings and his father and mother, and he loves them and he wants his family to be proud of him. At the present time he is living comfortably in his parent’s house. Jhonatan works selling ice-cold soft drinks at wholesale by the carton or individually to take away, from his parent’s house where they have an adjustable freezer to cool the drinks and sell them as their customers prefer them.

He has been in this business for a year. He serves the clients graciously himself, and sometimes his siblings help when he is away from the house. He likes the business because it allows him to have an income to pay his personal expenses and to help his parents with the household expenses and also he has financial liberty and independence. He is hoping to become a prosperous businessman. Now, seeing the good results that he is having, he wants to continue with the business hoping to expand and increase the volume of his stock and merchandise. 

This will be his second loan through MFP. He is grateful for the financial help in order to move his company forward. Also, he likes the community bank and considers the members to be friendly and supportive. With the money from the loan, 1500 nuevos soles, he will invest in the purchase of more drinks at wholesale prince so that he can increase his profits, and can buy various sizes and varieties in order to serve his clients better.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks of various varieties and sizes

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes,gallinas y ovejas,la socia los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Cachimayo,la socia tarbaja desde las 8:00 a.m ahsta las 4:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de crianza de animales.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales y alimentos para los animales.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is still working in the business of breeding animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and sheep. The member raises and fattens them for later sale at the different markets that exist in the district of Cachimayo. She works from 8:00am until 4:00pm and through this work she brings up her son. Her dream is to expand the business of raising animals. The member is asking for a loan in order to buy animals and animal feed.

The member is happy for the loan and she promises to make her payments according to plan.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed for the animals

loans.name: Marvin José

texts.es:
El señor Marvin es un hombre trabajador quien desde hace más de 20 años se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras en el mercado municipal. El inicio con unos cuantos productos y poco a poco fue aumentando y comprando mayor cantidad.
El invertirá el crédito en naranjas y mandarinas ya que esta es su temporada.
texts.en:
Marvin is a hardworking man who for more than twenty years has worked in the business of fruits and vegetables in the city market. 

He began with a few products and little by little he expanded and bought larger amounts.

He will invest the money from the loan to buy oranges and tangerines as they are in season.

loans.use: to buy oranges and tangerines.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 28 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es conviviente con Aliardo quien es obrero, fruto de esa unión tiene dos hermosos hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad, a quienes quiere mucho, habitando cómodamente su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Rosa es la venta de productos de belleza que compra por catálogo y los vende entre sus amistades, familiares y conocidas; muchas veces al contado y otras a crédito a 30 días, logrando buenos resultados. Lleva en ese negocio cerca de 11 años realizándola y paralelo a ésta actividad también vende ropas para niños pero de manera ocasional por temporadas como fechas festivas. Lo que le gusta de su negocio es que puede manejar sus tiempos libres para dedicarlos a sus pequeños hijos a quienes quiere mucho y son su motivación para salir adelante, además de los ingresos económicos que le genera con los cuales puede apoyar a su pareja y pagar los gastos de su hogar. Por lo contrario comenta que le incomoda cuando sus clientes se retrasan en el pago de sus créditos, pero eso no la desanima y tiene planes de seguir trabajando ya que se siente bien y conforme con su negocio, pues le da la independencia que ella necesita. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con la oportunidad de contar con un línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio, además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser personas responsables y amables. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de ropa de niños de diversos modelos y marcas.
texts.en:
Rosa, at 28 years of age, is a hardworking and persevering woman wanting to get ahead. She lives with Aliardo who is a laborer, and from this relationship she has two beautiful children who are 8 and 2 years old. She loves them very much, and they are living comfortably in their own home. Rosa sells beauty products that she buys through a catalog and sells among her friends, relatives and acquaintances. Many times they pay by cash and other times she offers them 30 day credit, achieving good results. She has been in this business about 11 years and at the same time she sells children’s clothing but does it occasionally during festival periods.

What she likes about the business is that she can manage her time to be free to devote time to her little children that she loves so much and who are her motivation for getting ahead. Also with the income she earns she can help her partner pay the household expenses. But on the other hand, she comments that she is uncomfortable when her clients are late in their payments, but this does not discourage her and she has plans to continue working and already she is feeling good and contented with her business, and as well, it gives her the independence that she needs.

This will be her second loan through MFP, and she feels grateful for the opportunity of having a loan in order to get ahead in her business. Furthermore, she comments that she likes the communal bank as she considers the members to be trustworthy and friendly. With the 1500 nuevos soles she will buy various kinds and brands of clothing for children.

loans.use: to buy various kinds of children's clothing

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Alejandrina tiene 53 años de edad y es viuda pero tiene siete hijos, él nació en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal de Alejandrina es la venta de golosinas en la puerta de un colegio de la ciudad del Cusco ósea de forma ambulatoria. También, Alejandrina se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su propia tienda de abarrotes. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Alejandrina requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro.
texts.en:
The “Andres Avelino Caceres” communal bank is composed of responsible, hard-working people who are advancing their families. The majority of its members live in the city of Cusco where they also conduct their economic activities. Cusco is known for being a popular tourist and commercial zone, famous for its traditional  “Inti Raymi” festival, and because nearby you'll find one of the 7 marvels of the world, “Machupicchu.”

Alejandrina is 53 years old and a widow, but she has 7 children. She was born in the district, province, and department of Cusco where she still lives. Alejandrina's principal economic activity is selling sweets at the door of a school in the city of Cusco, or on foot in the streets. In addition, Alejandrina sells products of primary necessity in her own little grocery store. She has been in this business for 4 years and it is going well for her. 

On this occasion, Alejandrina needs a loan to pay for maintenance of her car.

loans.use: to repair her car.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de pollipapas y salchipapas que es un plato de a base de salchichas,pollo y papas,ella vende en forma ambulatoria,ella tiene un carrito salchipapero donde trabaja desde las 4:00 p.m hasta las 12:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde puede vender las salchipapas y pollipapas.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar salchichas,pollos y papas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues running a business selling 'pollipapas' and 'salchipapas' (which are made from sausages, chicken and potatoes).  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor.  She has a 'salchipapas' cart where she works from 4.00pm to 12.00am.  Through this business, she provides for her children.  The member's dream is to have sales premises from which she can sell her 'salchipapas' and 'pollipapas'.  She is requesting this loan to buy sausages, chicken and potatoes wholesale.

The member is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy sausages, chicken and potatoes wholesale

loans.name: Sonia Isabel

texts.es:
La señora  Sonia Isabel es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una pequeña pulpería desde hace 10 años. Ella inicio este negocio  con unos ahorros y poco a poco fue creciendo.
El crédito lo invertirá en granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar…etc.)
Ella está casada con don Guadalupe con el cual tiene dos hijos por los cuales trabajan arduamente.
texts.en: Sonia Isabel is a hardworking, enterprising woman who has had a small grocery store for ten years.  She started the business with some savings and has gradually grown.  She will use the loan to buy basic grains (rice, beans, oil, sugar, etc.)  She’s married to Guadalupe and has two children with him that they are working hard for.

loans.use: to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Juan tiene 30 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, él nació en el distrito de Chinchero de la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco y vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal de Juan es elaboración de artesanía de tipo imaginería cusqueña (nacimientos cusqueños). Ya son siete años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Juan requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo pinceles, pinturas, yeso y esmaltes.
texts.en:
The “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” communal bank’s members are responsible, hardworking people who support their families.  Most of the members live in the city of Cusco where they also carry out their economic activities.  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial zone as well as for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

Juan is 30 years old and is in a common law relationship; he has a son.  He was born in Chinchero District in Urubamba Province, Cusco Department and lives in the city of Cusco.  Juan’s main economic activity is making traditional Cusco-style crafts (Cusco-style nativity scenes).  He’s been in this business seven years and does very well.  On this occasion Juan needs the loan to buy work supplies like brushes, paint, plaster and enamel, for example.

loans.use: to buy work supplies like brushes, pain, plaster and enamel.

loans.name: Martha Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Martha del Carmen  es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de ropa por encargo y comida, lo cual distribuye en su centro de trabajo en la zona franca. Este negocio lo inicio desde hace  un año con ayuda de su esposo. 
  El crédito lo invertirá en granos básicos, plátanos, pollo y ropa..etc.
texts.en: Martha del Carmen is a hardworking, enterprising woman who is a merchant selling clothes on order and food which she sells at her place of work in the free zone.  This business started a year ago with help from her husband.  She will use the loan to buy basic grains, bananas, chicken, clothes, etc.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, chicken and clothes.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte,el tiene un carro que hace servicio interprovincial hacia el distrito de Anta,por medio de este negocio el socio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es comprarse otro carro.El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz y azucar para su casa.
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with his transportation business.  He has a car that provides interprovincial service all the way to Anta.  Through this business he wants to get ahead.  His dream is to buy another car.  He’s asking for the loan to buy rice and sugar for his house.  He’s happy about the loan and committed to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Wilfredo tiene 33 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre, él nació en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal de Wilfredo es la construcción civil y también tiene un pequeño negocio familiar de venta de animales menores. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Wilfredo requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes y gallinas. (El socio en la fotografia esta acompañado de su esposa).
texts.en:
The “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” communal bank’s members are responsible, hardworking people who support their families.  Most of the members live in the city of Cusco where they also carry out their economic activities.  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial zone as well as for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

Wilfredo is 33 years old and lives in a common law relationship.  He was born in Cusco District in Cusco Province and Cusco Department and still lives in the beautiful city of his birth.  Wilfredo’s main economic activity is civil construction but also has a small family business selling small farm animals.  He’s been in business for several years now and does very well.  On this occasion Wilfredo needs the loan to buy small farm animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  

(In the photo, he’s accompanied by his wife.)

loans.use: to buy small farm animals like guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Obra Misionera Group

texts.es:
Obra misionera es el grupo formado por 17 mujeres de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, ellas son mujeres con muchos deseos de progreso y crecimiento, tienen la esperanza de un futuro mejor para ellas y sus hijos, es por ello que se esfuerzan al máximo para poder cumplir ese sueño.
Maximina es una de las miembros del grupo, y también es la presidenta, comenta que ella al igual que sus demás compañeras tiene el deseo de poder darles un mejor estilo de vida a su familia y también poder seguir ayudando con los gastos de la casa. Ella comenta que su medio de vida es la venta de frutas y en su tiempo libre recicla.
Ella solicita el crédito para abastecerse con frutas de estación, pues de esta forma tendrá surtido su stock para hacer frente al pedido de los clientes.
texts.en:
“Obra Misionera” is the group formed by 17 women from the city of Villa Elisa.  They are women who very much want to grow and make progress; they hope for a better future for themselves and for their children and this is why they strive to the maximum effort to reach this dream.

Maximina is one of the members of the group and she’s also its President.  She comments that she and her fellow members want to provide a better standard of living for their families and also continue to help with household expenses.  She comments that her way of earning her livelihood is selling fruit and in her free time she recycles.

She requested the loan to stock up on seasonal fruit because this way she’ll be well-stocked and be able to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Albert

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte,el es propietario de un carro que hace servicio de taxi,el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m ahsta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio el socio quiere estudiar una carrera profesional,el sueño del socio es tener otro carro nuevo.El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos y mantenimiento de su carro.
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with his transportation business.  He owns a car that provides taxi services.  He works from 7am until 10pm and through this business wants to study a professional career.  His dream is to have another new car.  He’s asking for the loan to buy spare parts and to service his car.  He’s happy about the loan and committed to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to service his car.

loans.name: Nelida

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Nelida tiene 27 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre, ella nació en el distrito de Anta de la provincia de Anta departamento del Cusco pero vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Nelida trabaja en un hotel pero también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Nelida requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes y gallinas.
texts.en:
The “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” communal bank’s members are responsible, hardworking people who support their families.  Most of the members live in the city of Cusco where they also carry out their economic activities.  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial zone as well as for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

Nélida, 27, is in a common law relationship.  She was born in Anta District in Anta Province, Cusco Department and lives in the city of Cusco.  Nélida works in a hotel but also raises small farm animals.   She’s been in this business several years now and does very well.  On this occasion Nélida needs the loan to buy small farm animals like guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.use: to buy small farm animals like guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Twifashe Group

texts.fr:
Jacinthe fait partie du groupe Twifashe.  Elle habite à Gitega,  est âgée de 22 ans. Elle est mariée à Alexis, commerçant des beignets. Ensemble ils ont 1 enfants, âgé de 2 ans.

Elle fait le commerce de beignets depuis 3 ans.

Elle est à son cinquième  crédit avec Turame. Avec le crédit Kiva qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de farine pour préparer beaucoup de beignets à vendre,afin de gagner plus. 

Le crédit lui permettra de bien nourrir sa famille, payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants, et assurer les soins de santé de sa famille.
texts.en:
Jacinthe, age 22, is a member of Twifashe Group. She lives in Gitega and is married to Alexis, who sells doughnuts. Together, they have one child, who is two years old. Jacinthe has been selling doughnuts for three years.

She's seeking her fifth loan from Kiva's partner, Turame. She will use it to bolster her working capital and purchase a large quantity of flour to make lots of doughnuts to sell, in order to increase her profits.

The loan will enable her to feed her family and pay the school expenses of her children and healthcare costs of her family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of flour to make doughnuts

loans.name: Mufeeda

texts.en:
Mufeeda is a 34-year-old married woman from Ashrafieh and a mother of four children.

Mufeeda is a tailor and she has a home-based project and is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase a new sewing machine.

Mufeeda is looking to increase the number of sewing machines she has, then open a new shop for her business since the old one burned.

An aspiration of Mufeeda's is to finance her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Lleny

texts.es: Lleny, de 34 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de tener muchas ganas de progresar, está casada con Fernando quien es mecánico, fruto de esa unión tiene tres hijos de 12, 8 y 2 años de edad, a quienes quiere mucho, habitando cómodamente su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Lleny es la venta de fajas femeninas de diversos modelos y marcas de mejores calidades, las cuales compra en la ciudad de Lima, donde tiene una tía quien le envía los productos a pedido. Ella los vende entres sus colegas de su trabajo, siendo ella docente, proesión que aún ejerce, pero la venta de éstos productos tiene más de 03 años. Sus ventas lo realiza a crédito cobrando cada 30 días. Le gusta su actividad pues le permite tener un ingreso económico adicional al sueldo de su trabajo ya que muchas veces no le alcanzaba para pagar sus cuentas a pesar que las comparte con su esposo. Viendo la rentabilidad que tiene ha decidido continuar con su negocio y ahora tiene planes de abrir una tienda de venta de repuestos para motos ya que su esposo es mecánico. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecido de contar con el apoyo financiero para poder alcanzar sus objetivos. Además de sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues considera a sus integrantes ser personas responsable. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en compra de repuestos de motores para la venta, donde su tendría el apoyo de su esposo en la venta.
texts.en:
Lleny, 34, is a hardworking, dedicated woman besides having a strong desire to make progress.  She’s married to Fernando who is a mechanic and they have three children who are 12, 8 and 2 years old who she loves very much.  They live comfortably in their own house.

Lleny’s activity is selling various brands and models of high-quality women’s girdles that she buys in the city of Lima where she has an aunt that sends her the products she orders.  She sells them among her coworkers; she’s a teacher and is still practicing her profession, but she’s been selling these products for three years.  She sells on credit collecting every 30 days.  She likes her work because it produces extra income in addition to her salary because often she did not earn enough to cover all her expenses even though she shares them with her husband.  Seeing the profitability she has, she’s decided to continue with her business and now plans to open a motorcycle spare parts shop since her husband’s a mechanic.

This will be MFP loan #2 and she feels grateful to have financial support to reach her goals.  She also feels comfortable in her communal bank because she believes that its members are responsible people.  She will use the requested 1500 new soles to buy motorcycle spare parts to sell where her husband will help her with the sales.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts.

loans.name: Abaramye Group

texts.fr:
Mathilde fait partie du groupe Abaramye,  elle habite à Gitega.Elle est âgée de 40 ans et est mariée à Stanislas, un militaire. Ensemble ils ont 5enfants, âgé de 7 à 15 ans, 4 enfants parmi eux étudient.
Trois enfants de sa proche parenté sont sous sa charge. Ils ont respectivement 17 ans, 23ans et 25ans.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique(haricot,riz,farine,savon,…)

Elle est à son neuvième  crédit avec Turame. Avec le crédit Kiva qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et elle pourra acheter beaucoup d’articles de boutique (haricot, riz, farine, savon,…)à revendre, pour réaliser plus de bénéfices.

Le bénéfice que lui apporte son commerce, lui permet de payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants  et mieux satisfaire ses besoins de première nécessité.
texts.en:
Mathilde belongs to the Abaramye group and lives in Gitega. She is 40 years old and married to Stanislas, a soldier. They have five children together, ranging from 7 to 15 years old; two of them are students. She also has responsibility for three other close relatives who are 17, 23 and 25 years old respectively.

She has a shop business selling beans, rice, flour, soap..) and is on her ninth loan from Turame. With the loan from Kiva she is going to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of products (beans, rice, flour, soap..) to resell and make more profit.

The profits she makes from her business allows her to pay her children's school fees and to provide for her own basic needs.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of shop products (beans, rice, flour, soap) for resale, so that she can make more profit

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en: Esperance is 54 years old. She is a widow with seven children aged between 14 and 31. Only two of them go to school. She has been running a bar for the past 16 years. With the loan, she will buy more beer and sorghum to sell. She would like to have a booming business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more beer to sell.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La Esperanza es de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, está integrado por 17 mujeres, todas ellas se ven muy capaces de reunir los requisitos para poder salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras, son mujeres muy trabajadoras que diariamente luchan por el sustento de sus hijos y familiares, pretenden aumentar sus ingresos y aprender por medio del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya.
Justimiana es una mujer muy trabajadora y creativa, ella es modista y nos cuenta que siempre tiene buena clientela por que tiene muy buenos trabajos y gracias a eso se ha hecho ya muy conocida en el barrio. Cuenta que empezó desde pequeña a trabajar, por lo que no teme al trabajo. Su meta es tener un taller de costura bien grande donde poder hacer sus costuras.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, cierres, botones, gomas y demás insumos,los cuales ella siempre utiliza. Agradece por la oportunidad que kiva y la fundación les da.
texts.en:
“La Esperanza” is from the city of Villa Elisa and it’s composed of 17 women members who feel quite capable of having all the requirements needed to get ahead and to help one another.  They are very hardworking women who strive daily for their family’s support.  They intend to increase their income and to learn through Fundación Paraguaya’s Enterprising Women Program.

Justimiana is a very hardworking, creative woman.  She’s a seamstress and she tells us that she always has a good clientele because she has good jobs and thanks to this she’s become quite well known in her neighborhood.  She relates that she started working while still a little girl so she does not fear work.  Her goal is to have a very large sewing workshop where she can do her sewing.

She requested the loan to buy fabric, zippers, buttons, adhesives and other supplies she always uses.  She is grateful for the opportunity Kiva and the Fundación gives them.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, zippers, adhesives and other supplies.

loans.name: Fatma

texts.en:
Fatma has raised ten children and works to make a better future for them. She never finished elementary school but Fatma uses her skills, learned from her mother, to create an income. Fatma creates knitted clothing such as scarves, hats, ponchos and winter clothing. She has been able to create additional monthly income and help her family. 

Fatma needed this loan to purchase wool, string, patterns, supplies and materials.

Fatma wants to send her daughter to college and dreams of further expanding her business to include additional items and clothing.

loans.use: To purchase wool, string, patterns, supplies and materials.

loans.name: Valeria

texts.en: Valeria is aged 49. She is married to a farmer and they have 5 children who are between 7 and 21 years old. All of them go to school. For the past 25 years, she has sold foodstuffs. She has requested the loan to add more sorghum to her inventory as well as buying more beans to sell. In the future, she would like to be a distributor.

loans.use: To buy sorghum and beans to sell.

loans.name: Costasie

texts.en: Costasie is a 52-year-old widow with five children. For the past 17 years, she has been running a business selling foodstuffs, which helped her provide for the basic needs of the family. With the loan, she will buy more tones of sorghum. With the profits, she will make savings and renovate the house.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de golosinas y tambien ahora esta vendiendo comida,ella lleva a las personas que estan construyendo casas,ella tambien la socia lleva gaseosas,ella vende en forma ambulatoria,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las golosinas,gaseosas y comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas y gaseosas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working in the business of selling candy and now she is also selling food.  She delivers to people who are building houses.  She also delivers sodas.  She sells on foot.  With this business the member wants to get ahead.  Her dream is to have a place where she can sell the candy, sodas, and food.

The member is requesting the loan to buy candy and sodas wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy candy and sodas wholesale.

loans.name: Edisa

texts.en: Edisa is 42 years old. She is married with one child aged ten. Her child goes to school. She sells soft drinks such as sodas. She has been running the business for the past 12 years. With the loan she will, buy more sodas to sell and she plans to use the profits to build a house. In the future, she would like to build her own business premises instead of renting.

loans.use: To buy more sodas to sell.

loans.name: Juliette

texts.en: Juliette is aged 45. She has 8 children, 5 of whom attend school. Her husband works as farmer. For seven years she has been selling foodstuffs. She has requested this loan to buy more beans and sorghum to sell. With the profits from the business, she plans to pay school fees and make savings. In the future, she would like to have a big inventory.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is aged 25, and is single. He owns a boutique which he has been running for five years. With the loan he will add new items to the boutique such as cooking oil, soap, salt, rice and sugar. He plans to build a house from the profits he expects to obtain.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil, soap, salt, rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is a mother of five children aged between 4 and 13; all of her children are enrolled in school. Alphonsine is 44 years old. She sells different items in her retail shop which she has been running for seven years. With the loan, she will buy more sugar, rice and soap to sell. She plans to use the profits to pay school fees and in the near future, to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, maize flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine sells cows; she has been running this business for the past four years. Christine is 37 years old, and she has four children who are between 6 and 17 years old. They all go to school. She has requested the loan to buy more cows to sell. With the profits, she will pay school fees. She would like to own a motorcycle which could be useful for generating income in the future.

loans.use: To buy more cows to sell.

loans.name: Thacienne

texts.en: Thacienne is married to a carpenter. She is 34 years old. She has five children aged between 3 and 15. Four of them go to school. She sells sorghum and she has been running this business for the past five years. With the loan she will buy more sorghum to sell. She plans to use the profits to pay school fees for her children. She would like to see her business prospering in the future.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is 32 years old. She married to a motorcyclist. They have three children; two of them go to school. She sells milk and cooked cassava and she has been running this business for the past ten years. She has requested the loan to buy more milk and cooked cassava to sell. With the profits from this business she will establish a store to sell beverages. She would love to see her business prospering in the future.

loans.use: To buy more milk and cooked cassava to sell.

loans.name: Marie Chantal

texts.en: Marie Chantal is age 27. She has three children between 1 and 4 years old. None of them go to school yet. Her husband works as a motorcyclist. She has spent 4 years selling sorghum. With the loan she will buy more sorghum for resale. Marie Chantal would like to use the profits to make savings and make reinvestment in the same business. She would like to own a big stock of sorghum in the future.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum for resale.

loans.name: Francoise

texts.en: Francoise, age 57, is married to a farmer. They have 7 children aged between 12 and 31. Two of them attend school. She sells foodstuffs such as beans, sorghum and local drinks. She has requested the loan to add more sorghum and beans for resale. With the profits she will pay school fees for her children. In the future, she plans to build her own house.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum and beans for resale.

loans.name: Mayra Jacquelin

texts.es:
La señora Mayra tiene 31 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de cuatro hijos.
Mayra se dedica a la produccion de hojuelas de maiz, tamales, tajaditas, tacos y enchilada. dicha actividad  la realiza bien temprano todos los dias en su casa de habitacion, cuando tiene listo su producto sale a los caserios y aldeas para venderlo. El credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la fabricacion de sus golosinas. 
Su deseo es que sus hijos se le graduen de la universidad y tiene como proridad la construccion de su casa de cemento, actualmente vive en una casa fabricada de madera.
texts.en:
Mayra is 31 years old, married and the mother of four children. 

Mayra makes corn puff pastry, tamales, tajaditas (fried plantains), tacos and enchiladas. All of this happens quite early every day in her home, and when her goods are ready she heads to small local villages to sell them. 

She will use the loan to buy ingredients to make sweets. 

Mayra's dream is for her children to graduate from college; another high priority is the construction of her house with cement, as currently she lives in a house made of wood.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, sugar, seasonings, butter, oil, margarine, plantains, meat, corn flour, and vegetables.

loans.name: Heidy

texts.es: Heidy, de 23 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y alegre, así como amable y con muchas ganas de progresar, es conviviente con Jorge, vive en compañía de su pareja, sus dos hijos de 5 y 1 años de edad, su madre y  sus dos hermanas menores, habitando la casa de su madre. La actividad que realiza Heidy es la venta de comidas rápida en las noches, como pollos broster y alitas fritas, entre otros, instalándose en el frontis de una bodega cerca de la casa de su madre, dedicándose a este negocio cerca de 2 años, contando con la ayuda de su hermana. Además también se dedica a la venta de ropa de damas y caballeros que le envía su tía desde la ciudad de Lima cada 02 meses para luego venderlo. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener una ocupación ya que no pudo concluir sus estudios superiores y por la necesidad de tener un oficio y un ingreso económico con el cual pueda apoyar a su pareja en los gastos de su hogar ya que sus hijos son pequeños y tenían más necesidades, ahora viendo los buenos resultados de las ganancias que le genera, tiene planes de abrir un boutique o un restaurante. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida por el apoyo brindado de contar con un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Además de sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus miembros y los considera buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de ropa de damas y caballeros a precio por mayor para venderlo entre sus amistades.
texts.en:
Heidy, 23, is a hard-working, happy, and pleasant woman who very much wants to get ahead.  She and her partner Jorge live in her mother's house with her two children, ages 5 and 1, her mother, and her two younger sisters.

The work she does is sell fast food at night, such as rotisserie chicken and fried wings, among others.  She sets up in front of a grocery store near her mother's house.  She has been doing this job for about two years, and counts on the help of her sister.  She also works selling women's and men's clothing that her aunt sends her from the city of Lima every two months to sell.

What she likes about her work is that it allows her to have a job.  She was unable to finish her advanced studies and needed to have a job and an income to be able to help her partner with the household expenses because her children are small and have more needs.  Now, seeing the good results of the profits it has generated for her, she plans to open a boutique or a restaurant.

This will be her second loan with the MFP institution.  She feels grateful for the support offered, of being able to count on financial help to realize her plans.  Also, she feels comfortable with her communal bank because she knows the members and considers them good people.

With the requested loan of 1000 PEN, she will invest in buying women's and men's clothing wholesale to sell to her friends.

loans.use: to buy clothing for women and men.

loans.name: Abizera Group

texts.fr:
Aline I fait partie du groupe Abizera  elle habite à Gitega. Elle  est âgée de 39 ans et est mariée à François, commençant de souliers. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants, l’un a 2 ans et l’autre 4ans.

Elle est  commerçante des souliers depuis 12ans.

Elle est à son sixième  crédit avec Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va augmenter son capital et améliorer la situation de sa famille en achetant ce dont elle a besoin (habits, alimentation, payer la scolarité des enfants,…). 

Dans les prochaines  années,  elle pourra diversifier les produits de vente(les habits,…)
texts.en:
Aline lives in Gitega and belongs to the "Abizera" group. She is 39 years old and married to François, a shoe-seller. They have two children together, one of whom is 2 and the other is 4.

She has been selling shoes for 12 years.

She is on her sixth loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan she obtains, she is going to increase her capital and improve her family's situation by buying what she needs (clothing, food, paying for her children's education...).

In the coming years, she will be able to diversify the goods she sells (clothing,...).

loans.use: To increase her capital and improve her family's situation by buying what she needs (clothing, food, paying for her children's education, etc.)

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 29 years old and married to a farmer. They have four children between the ages of 3 and 10. Two of them go to school. She sells beer, and she has been doing this business for the past 9 years. With the loan she will buy more crates of beer for resale. With the profits she will reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more beers for resale.

loans.name: Athanasie

texts.en: Athanasie is a 38-year-old mum, with 6 children in the range of 6 to 19 years old. Five of them go to school. Her husband is a farmer. She sells different items such as rice and sugar. She has requested the loan to add more similar items in the boutique from which she has been running this business for the period of 12 years. The profits from the business will be reinvested in the business.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs such as rice and sugar for resale.

loans.name: Gaudance

texts.en: Gaudence is 22 years old. She is married with two children. Her husband is a farmer. She has spent 3 years selling foodstuffs. She requested the loan to buy more beans and sorghum for resale. She plans to use the profits for making savings.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs for resale.

loans.name: Eva Maribel

texts.es:
La señora Eva Maribel tiene 35 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 5 hijos.
Eva Maribel se dedica a la produccion y venta de nacatamales y golosinas, tiene 2 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, El credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la fabricacion de los nacatamales.  
Tiene muchos clientes ya que sus ventas las realiza en una empacadora de camarones. 
Su meta es mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en: Eva Maribel, 35, is married and has five children.  She works making and selling "nacatamales" [tamales wrapped in banana leaf] and sweets.  She has been doing this type of work for two years.  She will use the loan to buy ingredients to make the nacatamales.  She has a lot of customers because she makes her sales in a shrimp packer.  Her goal is to improve her children's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn flour, meat, vegetables, firewood, and condiments.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de queso y tambien sigue vendiendo productos de belleza como lapiz labiales,cremas y perfumes,ella vende en forma independiente,al socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los quesos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar quesos y productos de belleza como perfumes,cremas y lapiz labiales al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member still sells cheese as well as selling beauty products like lipsticks, creams and perfumes. She works independently, working from 8am to 6pm.

Through her business, the member wants to support her children. Her dream is the to have a shop where she can sell her cheeses. 

The member is requesting the loan to buy cheeses and beauty products like perfumes, creams and lipsticks from wholesalers.

The member is grateful for the loan and and commits to paying back her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy cheeses and beauty products such as perfumes, creams and lipstick from wholesalers..

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnación surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la Fundación,  el grupo se encuentra en el 16º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2007.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Priscila, quien  tiene 5 hijos , está acompañada con el Sr. Wilfrido. Ella se dedica hace varios años a las ventas, pues tiene una pequeña despensa bien surtida, donde surte a la mayor parte de su barrio. Cuenta la Sra. Priscila que desea poder mejorando su negocio, para que de esa forma siga creciendo como microempresaria.
Solicita  el crédito para la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser arroz, fideos, azúcar, granos, lácteos y demás. Está contenta con la oportunidad de progreso que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
This group in the city of Encarnación started up thanks to one of its members contact with the Foundation. The group is in its 16th cycle and has been working with the Foundation since 2007.

One of the group members is Priscila, who has 5 children and is in a relationship with Wilfrido. 

She has worked in sales for several years and has a small, well-stocked store, where she supplies most of her area. 

Priscila wants to be able to improve her business so that she can keep growing as a small business woman.

She is asking for the loan to buy ingredients for her store, like rice, noodles, sugar, grains, milk products and other things. 

She is pleased with the opportunity to progress that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, sugar, grains, dairy products and others things.

loans.name: La Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
La señora HAYDEE MARILUZ  de 49 años de edad de estado civil viuda, con 03 hijos menores de edad. Es socias de la  alcancía comunal “La Sagrada Familia”.
Actualmente se dedica a la Venta de Comidas en el mercadillo de su localidad, vende menú almuerzo y cena, etc. El préstamo solicito para invertir en la remodelación e implementación de su puesto de venta, dándose la oportunidad para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
Desea en el futuro comprar su tener su propio restaurantes, ella está ubicada la primera persona lado derecha viste con una un polo color negro está sentada en una silla.
texts.en:
Haydee Mariluz, is 49 years old and widowed, with three young children. She is a member of the comunal bank "La Sagrada Familia".

Currently, she sells food at her local market, she sells lunch and dinner menus etc.

She is asking for the loan to invest in the remodelling and implementation of her sales post, giving her the opportunity to improve her economic income.

In the future she wants to buy her own restaurants. In the picture she is the first person on the right wearing a black polo shirt and sat in a chair.

loans.use: to sell foods at the market.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa,ella vende pantalones,polos,blusas,ella vende en forma independiente,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa al por mayor como casacas,panatalones,polos y blusas.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working in the business of selling clothing.  She sells pants, polo shirts, and blouses.  She sells independently.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.  With this business the member wants to get ahead.  Her dream is to expand her business selling clothing.

The member is requesting the loan to buy clothing wholesale, such as jackets, pants, polo shirts, and blouses.  She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale, such as jackets, pants, polo shirts, and blouses.

loans.name: Ena Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Ena del Rosario  es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica a la realización de refresco desde hace 9 años. Este negocio lo inicio con una tía, luego con ayuda de su suegra  se independizo ya que logro comprar su carretón, baldes y materiales. El crédito lo invertirá en  insumos linaza, naranja, mandarina, piña, limones, bolsas, azúcar…etc.
texts.en:
Ena del Rosario is a hard-working and enterprising woman who has worked making soft drinks for nine years.  She started this business with an aunt.  Later, with the help of her mother-in-law, she became independent because she managed to buy her cart, pails, and equipment.

She will invest the loan in supplies: linseed, oranges, mandarins, pineapples, lemons, bags, sugar, etc.

loans.use: to buy supplies: linseed, oranges, mandarins, pineapples, lemons, bags, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Alan

texts.es: Alan, de 30 años de edad, es de profesión técnico en enfermería, siendo un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, es soltero, vive en compañía de su madre y su hermano, a los que quiere mucho y apoya en lo que puede, habitando cómodamente la casa de su madre. La actividad que desea iniciar Alan es la de abrir un tópico de enfermeria ya que cuenta con el conocimiento por la carrera que estudió. Por eso tiene planes de asociarse con sus colegas de trabajo, donde él colaborará con parte del capital y sus futuros socios con el local, así formará una pequeña empresa.  Lo que espera es tener ingresos adicionales y así podrá apoyar a su madre con los gastos de su hogar, a parte de que tiene planes de independizarse buscando comprarse un casa propia, para ello deberá trabajar duro y ahorra. Mas adelante espera formar una botica. Este será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecido por la oportunidad de contar con una línea de crédito para avanzar con sus objetivos. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a la mayoría de sus integrantes y los considera ser buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en su totalidad en el negocio de un tópico de enfermería que tiene planeado.
texts.en:
Alan, 30, is by profession a nursing technician and a hard-working man.  He is single and lives comfortably in his mother's house with his mother and brother, whom he loves very much and supports as much as he can.

The job Alan wants to start is opening a basic health care facility, since he has the knowledge because of his studies.  This is why he has plans to get together with his work colleagues to set up a small business in which he will collaborate with part of the capital and his future associates with the location.

What he hopes for is to have additional income so he will be able to help his mother with the household expenses.  Besides, he has plans to become independent and is looking to buy his own house, for which he must work hard and save.  Later on he hopes to set up a pharmacy.

This will be his first loan with the MFP institution.  He feels grateful for the opportunity to have a line of credit to get ahead with his goals.  He also comments that he feels at home with his communal bank because he knows the majority of the members and considers them to be good people.

He will invest the requested loan of 1000 PEN in its entirely in the health care facility business that he has planned.

loans.use: to set up a basic health care facility.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.es:
Modesto, es de la ciudad de Santaní, es soltero, tiene hijos aun menores de edad. El señor es propietario de un aserradero y además de eso tiene una despensa en su propia casa.
Comenta que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana y termina ya bien entrada la noche. El es un hombre muy trabajador y comprometido con los suyos. Es por ello que se esfuerza al máximo. Quienes lo inspiran a trabajar son sus hijos y familiares.
Solicita la ayuda de fundación paraguaya y de Kiva para la compra de panificados, lácteos, productos a granel y demás artículos de primera necesidad, los cuales son los que tienen mayor salida en su despensa.
texts.en:
Modesto is from the city of Santaní. He is single and he has young children. He owns a sawmill and he also has a small grocery store in his house.

He tells us that he works every day from very early in the morning and finishes his day late at night. He is a very hardworking man and takes care of his family. This is why he works as hard as he can. The people that inspire him to work are his children and his family members.

He is requesting the help of Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva so he can buy bread products, dairy products, bulk products and other items of daily use, which are what he sells the most of in his store.

loans.use: to buy bread products, dairy products, bulk products and other items

loans.name: Raul Cesar

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de servicio de taxi,el trabaja en las diferentes ciudades del Cusco,el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este trbajo el socio saca adelante a sus hijo,el sueño del socio es mejorar el servicio de taxi.El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar llantas para su carro.
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is still working as a taxi service provider in different cities in Cusco. He works from 7:00 am until 10:00 pm. His work provides him with the means to raise his children. His dream is to improve the taxi service he provides. He is requesting the loan to buy tires for his car.

The member is happy about this loan and is committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car.

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn is married with 4 children. She lives in Mauswagon, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. Jenalyn buys and sells charcoal to earn a living and has had this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 2,000 doing this type of work. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase charcoal for resale in her retail business. She has been a member of PMPC for more than 1 year. In the future, Jenalyn hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Las Violetas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Edita  es casada, tiene 7 hijos, actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Las Violetas” grupo  conformado por 7  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Edita   trabaja desde hace  15 años en la venta de golosinas en  frente de un  colegio este trabajo surge porque ella quería ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y la manutención de sus hijos ya que lo que su esposo ganaba no era suficiente para mantener a sus 7 hijos  y a su vez trabaja en un comedor popular de cocinera , pero gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mejores ingresos económicos , sus hijos pueden ir al colegio ,  se ha comprado algunos artefactos eléctricos y sobre todo su familia tiene una mejor calidad de vida. El préstamo que se le otorgo fue para comprar mercadería golosinas, dulces .  Sabemos que Edita  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Edita is married and has 7 children. She is currently a member of the communal savings group “Las Violetas”, a group made up of 7 members who work in different commerce related activities. Edita has worked selling sweets outside a school for the last 15 years . She started working because she wanted to help her husband with housekeeping expenses and providing sustenance for their children, as what he earned was not enough to keep all 7 of them. She also works as a cook in a community soup kitchen. Thanks to her efforts and dedication, she currently earns a better income, her children can go to school, she has bought some electrical appliances and, most importantly, her family’s living standards have improved. The loan she was granted was for buying sweets.  We know Edita will achieve her objectives by working hard and putting a lot of effort into what she does, and that Edaprospo’s loans will help her do this.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (sweets)

loans.name: Epifanio

texts.es:
Epifanio, de 61 años; es un hombre singular. Vive en compañía de su amada esposa, Reina, con quien se caso desde hace 35 años. Ambos tienen 7 hijos pero solo viven con uno de ellos, Franck, al que cuidan con mucho amor en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Santa Cruz – Acostambo.   Él es un hombre ejemplar. Desde que tubo 18 años comenzó a trabajar la tierra y producirla, también se dedicaba al negocio de compra y venta de ganado. Con tiempo formó su familia, de la que hoy se siente orgulloso. Desde entonces dedicó su tiempo a sembrar papa, cebada, habas, quinua, alverja y demás hortalizas. “Solo falta que produzca lentejas”, cometa con simpatía. Pues en todo este tiempo adquirió la experiencia y destreza en los negocios tanto así que pudo comprase sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Pero no dejó de criar animales, posee numerosas vacas, de las cuales extrae leche para comercializarlo, de esa manera obtiene un dinero extra además de alimentar a su familia con ella. Este es el décimo quinto préstamo con MFP y está contento de saber, que tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias.
Epifanio, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa y cebada.
texts.en:
Sixty-one year old Epifanio is a special man. He lives with his beloved wife Reina, whom he married 35 years ago. They have 7 children, but only one lives with them, Franck, whom they look after lovingly in their own house located in the small village of Santa Cruz – Acostambo.   He is an exemplary man. He had to start working the land from the age of 18. He also bought and sold cattle. As time went by, he started and raised a family, of which he feels proud today. He grows potatoes, barley, broad beans, quinoa, peas and other vegetables. “I’ve still to grow lentils”, he comments friendlily. Over the years, he acquired experience and ability for business, so much so, that he was able to buy his own farming land. He did not stop breeding animals, however. He has several cows that produce milk for sale. This way he obtains some extra money, as well as feeding his family with some of it. This is his fifteenth loan with MFP and he is happy to know that he will receive financial support and will be able to carry on with his work. He promises to pay the installments on time. He likes being part of the association because all its members are responsible and supportive.
If he gets the loan, Epifanio will use the money to buy several bags of natural fertilizers to use on his potato and barley crops.

loans.use: to buy several bags of fertilizers.

loans.name: Lilia Group

texts.en:
Lilia is married with 4 children. She is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. 

She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase equipment for plowing the rice field. She has been a member of PMPC for less than a year. 

Lilia is the leader of a 2-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: To purchase equipment for plowing the rice field.

loans.name: Gary

texts.en:
Gary is 46 years old and lives in Talairon, Oroquieta City. He is married with two children. Gary has a general store business and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. He has a requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock for his store. 

He has been a member of PMPC for a year. In the future, Gary hopes to have a general merchandise business to earn money for the family's future and for the children in their studies. Gary is a MIGS member of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for his general store.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia sigue en su negocio de venta de zapatos  y ropa interior como polos y medias,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los zapatos y ropa interior como polos y medias.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar zapatos y ropa interior al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maribel continues in her business of selling shoes and underwear, including polo shirts and hose. She sells her goods in the streets from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm. Through these transactions, she is able to advance her children. 

Maribel's dream is to have her own shop where she can sell shoes and underwear, including polo shirts and hose. She is requesting this loan to buy shoes and underwear at wholesale. Maribel is happy about the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy shoes and underwear at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: César, de 34 años es un hombre trabajador. Junto a Julia, su esposa desde hace 10 años; cuidan de sus 3 hijos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Acostambo. “Me falta muchos objetivos por cumplir”, afirma. Aún no posee el dinero necesario para comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas, pero eso no lo desanima al contrario. Trabaja cada día con más esfuerzo, ahorrando lo que pueda para comprar uno. Ya tiene 7 años de experiencia en la siembra de papa, olluco, oca, mashua, cebada, habas y alverja. Cuenta que alquila terrenos de su comunidad, porque cuestan menos y de esa manera apoya en el crecimiento de sus pobladores. En cada cosecha aprovecha sus viajes a la capital para vender sus alimentos. Viaja 2 veces a la semana, llevando maca, alverja y papa; los cuales vende al menudeo en el mercado “la parada”, que es la más grande del país. Como es un hombre de campo, cuenta que posee 3 caballos y 3 burros los cuales utiliza como animales de carga para trasportar los fertilizantes hacia sus sembríos. “de esa manera me canso menos”, comenta. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP y está contento de saber, que tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. César de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa de la variedades “yungay, canchan, andina y huairo macho”.
texts.en:
Cesar, age 34, is a hardworking man. Together with Julia, his wife of ten years, he cares for their children in their own home, which is located in the district of Acostambo. "I have many goals to fulfill," he declares. 

Although he doesn't have the money necessary to buy his own agricultural land, he doesn't let this discourage him. Every day he puts more effort into his work, and saves what he can towards buying land. Already Cesar has seven years of experience growing potatoes, other tuber vegetables such as ulluco, oca, and mashua, barley, broad beans, and peas. He says that he rents plots of land from his community because it costs less and this way he also supports growth for its inhabitants. 

For every harvest he takes advantage of his trips to the capital to sell his crops. He travels twice a week, bringing maca, peas and potatoes, which he sells at "La parada", the largest market in the country. 

As he's a country man, he takes advantage of owning three horses and three donkeys and uses them as cargo animals to transport fertilizer to the fields. "This way I get less tired," he explains. 

This is Cesar's fifth loan with MFP, and is happy to know that he will have financial support and feels secure continuing with his work. Apart from anything else he promises to comply with his payments. Furthermore he appreciates being a part of his community bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive. 

Upon receiving the funds, Cesar will invest the money requested in the purchase of natural fertilizers to spread on his crops, which include several varieties of potato such as yungay, canchán, Andean and huario macho.

loans.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Zulma

texts.es:
La Sra. Zulma tiene 54 años de edad, es de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, es casada, tiene 2  hijos, el mayor de 24 años y el menor de 16 años.
La Sra. Zulma se dedica a la venta de bebidas y comestibles en su Despensa, hace aproximadamente 10 años. Comenzó con un puesto en el mercado de la cuidad de Limpio donde vendía verduras y frutas. Con el tiempo pudo abrir una despensa en su domicilio y dejó su puesto en el mercado. Su meta es seguir progresando de la misma forma y como ha podido salir adelante.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, cervezas, gaseosas, vino, comestibles, arroz, azúcar, yerba, harina, aceite y demás insumos para poder abastecerse.
texts.en:
Zulma, 54, is from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. She is married and has 2 children - the elder is 24 and the younger is 16. Zulma has been selling drinks and food products in her grocery store for about 10 years. She started with a stall in the market in Limpio where she sold fruits and vegetables. Over time she was able to open a store in her home and leave her market stall. Her goal is to keep progressing this way and to get ahead. 

She requests a loan to buy drinks like beer, soda and wine; and food products like rice, sugar, tea, flour, oil and other things to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy drinks like beer, soda, and wine; and food products like rice, sugar, tea, flour, oil and other things.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es: Felicitas, de 38 años es una mujer sencilla. Junto a Hector, su esposo, cuidan de sus 2 hijos: Jorge Luis y Jhordy; en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la localidad de Chilca. Ella es una mujer peculiar; pues administra la siembra y su venta. Ya tiene 12 años de experiencia esparciendo semillas de papa, cebada, alverja, habas y maíz. Su modalidad de trabajo consiste en la asociación con otras personas, que ponen el terreno agrícola mientras ella invierte en la semilla y fertilizantes. Ya en la cosecha comercializa en la feria de Acostambo, donde reparten sus ganancias de manera equitativa. Además para obtener ganancias extras, trabaja como peón en otros terrenos agrícolas, pues quiere estar activa. Por su parte, su esposo trabaja en una mina, los visita cada 15 días, que una fecha de algarabía y gozo para su familia.
